300666.kr_flavor: [여러분, 저는 천리교도의 신자, 비나입니다. 제가 이 자리에 선 것은, 진리의 신의 진실을 고하기 위함입니다.]
300666.name: Aletheian Missionary B-NA

300667.flavor: [It's no longer required of me to remain locked away... I have to cleanse the taint.]
300667.kr_flavor: [이제 더 이상 신세를 질 필요는 없겠네요… 저는 그릇된 것을 고쳐야 해요]
300667.name: Mother Demon

300668.flavor: [How peaceful. I wonder how long these quiet days will continue?] [But hardships usually follow peace. Wouldn't it be interesting? Hehe, I'm kidding, Celine senpai.]
300668.kr_flavor: [평화롭네요. 이런 나날이 언제까지 이어질까요?][약간의 안식 뒤에 이어질 파란, 흥미롭지 않나요? 후후, 농담이에요. 셀린선배.]
300668.name: Celine and Nanai in the calm before the storm

300689.flavor: [Let me go! Don't you know who I am?] [Your origin is looking for you. Let's go.]
300689.kr_flavor: [이거 놓아라! 내가 누군지 알고 이러는거냐!][당신의 근원이 당신을 찾습니다. 같이 가시죠.]
300689.name: Captured Spirit

300690.flavor: [Ah... the Cook Club room... our Cook Club room!]
300690.name: Discouraged Ritafarit

300691.flavor: [Kana. That place is really the mirror's...] [The moment Orte attempted to read the last line, a flash of light came from nowhere, and the book snapped shut.]
300691.kr_flavor: [카나. 그곳은 사실 거울의…][오르테가 마지막 구절을 읽으려는 찰나, 책이 어디선가 날라온 섬광을 흡수하면서 닫혀버렸다.]
300691.name: Witness of the End

300692.flavor: [A fierce storm approaches. In the center of that storm, people will wrongfully meet and become separated.]
300692.kr_flavor: [거대한 폭풍이 다가오고 있어요. 이 폭풍속에 누군가는 어긋난 만남을, 누군가는 헤어짐을 겪게 되겠죠.]
300692.name: Inspiration Lady

300693.flavor: [Master Linia, don't go. Those girls hold resentment toward you.]
300693.kr_flavor: [리니아님, 가지 말아주세요. 그녀들은 리니아님을 원망하고 있어요.]
300693.name: Maid Lesnoa

300694.flavor: [Cinia, did you endure hardships all this time?] [No, sister... Can we stay here for a while?]
300694.kr_flavor: [시니아 그동안 많이 힘들었지?][아니에요 언니…이제 계속 이곳에 있어주실거죠?]
300694.name: Lady Cinia and Rose

300696.flavor: [What is this thing? It's a model train that fell somewhere around the gate. What? I should be careful even though it's small?]
300696.kr_flavor: [문의 주변에 떨어져 있던 이 기차모형은 뭐죠? 네? 작은 뭐를 조심하라구요?]
300696.name: Seeker Ragafelt

300697.flavor: [Let's continue to work together in the future, Luthica.] [Yes, Jaina!]
300697.name: Knight Jaina and Luthica

300698.flavor: [No blood will be shed if you follow us obediently.] [You're all being used.] [It's a symbiotic relationship.]
300698.kr_flavor: [순순히 따라온다면 유혈사태는 일어나지 않을 거에요.][너흰 이용당하고 있는 거야.][정확히는 공생 관계죠.]
300698.name: GS 9th Star

300699.flavor: [Shoot signal flares to let all the members know. The GS is not finished yet.]
300699.kr_flavor: 봉화를 올려 각지의 단원들에게 알리세요. 아직 GS단은 끝나지 않았습니다.
300699.name: GS Advisor Ardita

300700.flavor: [In my foolishness, I've called forth a false being. Please let my prayer reach everyone...]
300700.kr_flavor: [저의 어리석음으로 인해 거짓된 존재를 불러내고 말았습니다. 이 기도가 여러분에게 닿기를]
300700.name: Praying Helena

300701.flavor: [How is it, how is it? Pretty? Cute? Thank you very much! There's no clothes that don't look good on me!]
300701.kr_flavor: [어때요 어때요? 이쁘죠? 귀엽죠? 정말 고마워요! 뭐 저한테 어울리지 않을 옷은 없겠지만요!]
300701.name: Chuseok Asmis

300702.flavor: [This is a hanbok? It's a bit uncomfortable to move around in, but I like it.]
300702.kr_flavor: [이게 한복이라는 옷이야? 활동하기엔 조금 불편하지만 마음에 들어.]
300702.name: Chuseok Linus

300703.flavor: [Sister, do you like those clothes?] [Yes, they're beautiful. Thank you, Cinia. Give Ophelia my thanks.]
300703.kr_flavor: [언니, 그 옷은 마음에 드시나요?][응 아름다워, 고마워 시니아. 오필리어님에게 감사의 말씀 전해주렴.]
300703.name: Chuseok Rose

300704.flavor: [This is a gift from the believers...? They're very nice clothes... Thank you. But doesn't this headband seem to be unrelated to the clothes?]
300704.kr_flavor: [신도들의 선물인가요…? 정말 좋은 옷이군요…감사합니다. 근데 이 머리띠는 이 옷과는 별로 상관 없어보이는데요?]
300704.name: Chuseok Helena

300705.flavor: [I am the second princess of Lazion, Hanobelle. Welcome to the Empire. Are you from the Alliance?]
300705.kr_flavor: [레이지온의 두번째 황녀. 하노벨입니다. 제국에 오신 걸 환영합니다. 연합국에서 오신 분들이시죠?]
300705.name: 2nd Princess Hanobelle

300706.flavor: [My duty is to guard the front door of the library. However, it looks like you used the back door. That's not my duty, so I have no interest in you.]
300706.kr_flavor: [내 역할은 도서관의 정문을 지키는 것. 하지만 너희는 뒷문으로 들어왔더군. 그건 내 역할은 아니니 딱히 신경쓰지는 않아]
300706.name: Library Club Gatekeeper

300707.flavor: [When there are no attendants around, it is very lonely. On those days, she eats Pe__ro Royle Chocolate. Pe__ro Royle chocolate costs 3000 GP per 5.]
300707.kr_flavor: [시종이 없어 외로운 날엔그녀는 페X로 로일 초콜릿을 먹는다. 페X로 로일 초콜릿, 5개들이 3천GP.]
300707.name: Lady Marie Lunen

300708.flavor: [My sister Florence is amazing. With just this glove and my sister, it seems like anything is possible.]
300708.kr_flavor: [플로렌스 언니는 정말 대단해요. 이 장갑과 언니만 있으면 모든걸 해낼 수 있을 것 같아요]
300708.name: Blue Cross Floria

300709.flavor: [If we had enough time and money, then we wouldn't be in this disgraceful situation! Just wait and see next time!]
300709.kr_flavor: [시간과 예산이 충분히 있었더라면 이런 굴욕적인 상황에 처하진 않았을 텐데! 다음엔 두고 보라고!]
300709.name: GS Research Chief Nitro

300710.flavor: [Cut the sky in half! Shake the earth! The cooking of the cosmos!]
300710.name: Cook Club Ace

300711.flavor: [This is only the 1024th book. How many more books do I have to read before those people get here?]
300711.kr_flavor: [이 책만 1024번째. 그분이 오실 때까지 이 도서관의 책을 몇번이나 더 읽어야 할까?]
300711.name: Library Manager Amrita

300712.flavor: [Oh, you're here senpais? I tried cooking for you all.]
300712.kr_flavor: [어머 선배님들, 오셨나요? 선배님들을 위해 제가 요리를 해봤어요.]
300712.name: Cook Club Aras

300713.flavor: [Madou! Destruction! You'll have a tough time dealing with the power of the stars!]
300713.kr_flavor: [마동! 파멸! 별의 힘으로 당신을 약간 곤란하게 만들어드릴께요!]
300713.name: Star Lady Chirushi

300714.flavor: [Since Cinia kept throwing out the clothes that Linia gave her, Linia took some drastic measures. She made all of the dresses in her closet disappear.] [Linia!]
300714.kr_flavor: [리니아가 준비한 옷을 매번 버리던 시니아를 위해 리니아는 특단의 조치를 취했다. 그녀의 옷장에서 그녀의 드레스들을 모두 치워버렸다][리니아 언니!]
300714.name: Lady Cinia Pacifica

300715.flavor: [The maids got a vacation, so Seron and Coco went to Linia's private beach.]
300715.kr_flavor: [메이드들은 휴가를 맞이하여 세론과 코코는 리니아의 사유지 해변에 놀러갔다.]
300715.name: Maid Seron and Coco

300716.flavor: [She is a knight who uses a sword of light. Her sword has the power to cut light.]
300716.kr_flavor: [빛의 검을 사용하는 기사단의 일원. 그녀의 검은 빛을 베는 정도의 힘이 있다.]
300716.name: Crux Knight Oclette

300717.flavor: [Pintail dreams today, too. She dreams that she's been discharged from the knights, and she can spend time peacefully in Crux. Yet, even in her dreams, she can't take her uniform off.]
300717.kr_flavor: [핀테일은 오늘도 꿈을 꾼다. 자신이 전역하여 교국을 뛰노는 모습을, 하지만 그녀의 꿈속에서도 군복은 벗지 못했다.]
300717.name: Dreaming Pintail

300718.flavor: [This is called a hanbok? I envy the place where Ophelia lived, where they have beautiful clothes like this.]
300718.kr_flavor: [이런 옷을 한복이라고 하던가요? 오필리어씨께서 살던 곳은 이런 아름다운 옷이 있다니 부럽네요.]
300718.name: Hanbok Luthica

300719.flavor: [Where are your friends?] [Kyaa!? Who is it? These vines are creepy!]
300719.kr_flavor: [네 친구들은 어디있지?][꺄악!? 누구? 이 넝쿨들 기분 나빠!]
300719.name: Overpowered Aletheian A-GA

300720.flavor: [This super logical slab seems like it's alive and moving! What's written here? It says, "Please wait a moment." What could this mean?]
300720.kr_flavor: [이 석판 매우 논리적으로 살아 움직이고 있어요! 여기 이건 뭐라 적혀 있는거죠? 잠시만 기다려 주세요? 라고 적혀 있네요. 무엇을 의미하는 걸까요?]
300720.name: Ancient Conundrum

300721.flavor: [If I say "Go!", then you have to respond with "Yes, maam!"]
300721.name: Swimsuit Undertaker

300722.flavor: [The fluttering of the bird's wings stirred ripples within the heart of the girl who had fallen into the depths. Those waves would never settle down.]
300722.kr_flavor: [새의 날갯짓소리는 깊게 가라앉은 소녀의 마음에 파문을 일으켰다.그것은 결코 가라앉지 않을 흔들림이었다.]
300722.name: Girl of Gray, Ann

300723.flavor: [Take my staff card. Don't buy anything unnecessary. Especially you, Sita.]
300723.kr_flavor: [그래 너흰 나의 법인카드에 걸린거야. 대신 쓸데없는 건 사지 말고. 특히 시타]
300723.name: Anyte Annus

300724.flavor: [A... Annus, are you only sending 3 girls?] [Do you want to go, Rianna?] [Ah... I have to prepare for the culture festival... ack]
300724.kr_flavor: [애…애너스 선생님, 여자아이 세명만 달랑 보내는건가요?][그럼 리안나 선생님이 가실래요?][아…전 문화제 준비 때문에…흑]
300724.name: Culture Festival Supervisor Rianna

300725.flavor: [The feeling of happiness from a mountain of cookies, the feeling of satisfaction from being full, the feeling of anticipation for the cookies that are remaining. She wants to express these complex feelings, but her mouth is busy.] [I want to eat more...]
300725.kr_flavor: [과자의 산으로 인한 행복, 포만감에 의한 만족감, 아직도 남은 과자에 대한 기대감. 이러한 복잡한 감정을 자랑하고 싶지만 자신의 입은 너무 바쁘다.][더 먹을래…]
300725.name: Cookie Hunter Sita

300726.flavor: [Sister Seron! What's it like working at master Linia's mansion? I want to be recognized like you so I can work at master Linia's mansion, too!]
300726.kr_flavor: [세론언니! 리니아님의 저택에서 일하시는건 어때요? 저도 어서 언니처럼 인정받아서 리니아님의 저택에서 일해보고 싶어요!]
300726.name: Maid Arte

300727.flavor: [It's been a while since I've played beach volleyball. Did you forget about the prize if I won?]
300727.kr_flavor: [오랜만에 재밌는 비치발리경기였어요. 이겼을 때의 보상 잊지 않으셨겠죠?]
300727.name: Lady Serbia

300728.flavor: [It's been a while since I've had a vacation, but the city is really boisterous today. I'll head back.]
300728.kr_flavor: [오늘은 모처럼만의 휴일인데 시내가 소란스럽군. 조금 돌아가볼까.]
300728.name: Lady Seresty

300729.flavor: [They say our national strength is our stamina, but isn't it our charm?]
300729.kr_flavor: [체력은 국력이라는 말이 있다던데 국력은 매력 아니야?]
300729.name: Knight Engineer

300731.flavor: [I can still be of help, even though I have a faint existence. Right, staff sergeant?]
300731.kr_flavor: [존재감이 옅어도 도움은 될수 있습니다. 그렇죠, 하사님?]
300731.name: Knight Agent Mytyl

300732.flavor: [Our new home is pleasant and always dark. I have to find a good spot quick.]
300732.kr_flavor: [새로운 거주지는 항상 어둡고 쾌적한 곳이라니 서둘러 좋은 곳을 차지해야겠어요.]
300732.name: Crescent Nazo

300733.flavor: [Not all vampires love blood the most. One example is Delaware. She likes sweet chocolate and cake more than blood.]
300733.kr_flavor: [흡혈귀라 해서 모두가 피를 가장 좋아하진 않는다. 그 예로 델라웨어, 그녀는 피보다도 달콤한 초콜릿이나 케익을 더 좋아한다.]
300733.name: Scardel Delaware

300734.flavor: [Why does this place only have young girls? I can't find any dreams worth entering...]
300734.kr_flavor: [왜 이곳은 여자애들 밖에 안보이지? 내가 들어갈만한 꿈이 안보이잖아…]
300734.name: Succubus Vermille

300735.flavor: [It's only natural that the master of cards would be the master of the field. I'll charge ahead at full speed.]
300735.kr_flavor: [카드를 지배하는 자가, 필드를 지배하는 법이죠. 전속전진으로 상대해 드리겠습니다.]
300735.name: Master of Cards

300736.flavor: [Miss Hanobelle, I've just returned from my assignment. From my assignment.] [Good job. What is that frontier like?]
300736.kr_flavor: [하노벨님 이제 막 임무를 마치고 귀환하였습니다. 귀환하였습니다.][수고하셨어요. 이번 프론티어는 어떤 곳이었나요?]
300736.name: Eisenwane

300737.flavor: [I don't know what else to do but to put all my effort into catching the person who messed up my clothes and our stuff.]
300737.kr_flavor: [다른 건 몰라도 내 옷과 쇼핑을 엉망으로 만든 놈은 꼭 잡아서 혼을 내야겠어.]
300737.name: Cook Club Poplar

300738.flavor: [This is a problem... I don't know what possessed Sita to buy so many snacks...]
300738.kr_flavor: [큰일이네요… 저도 모르게 시타에게 홀려서 그만 과자만 잔뜩…]
300738.name: Sighing Cook Club Director

300739.flavor: [What is this? What's with all these hopeless, careless, determined bills? Our whole budget has already been wiped out by tea!]
300739.kr_flavor: [뭐죠? 이 한심하고 무심하고 작심한 청구서들은? 이번 예산은 이미 홍차때문에 전멸이라구요!]
300739.name: Student Council Treasurer Amy

300740.flavor: [Carrie, since Toto left, I'm giving you the position of chief.] [Eh? Really, master Cinia? Thank you! I'm getting a raise, too, right?]
300740.kr_flavor: [캐리, 토토가 나간 덕분에 치프 자리가 공석이니 새로운 치프를 맡아 주셔야 겠어요.] [엣? 시니아님, 정말요? 감사합니다! 월급도 올라가는 거죠?]
300740.name: Chief Maid Carrie

300741.flavor: [How is it, master? I can look pretty good when I dress up, right?] [Of course. Clothes are like wings.]
300741.kr_flavor: [어때 마스터, 나도 갖춰 입으면 꽤 괜찮지 않아?][과연, 옷이 날개군.]
300741.name: Lady Ginger

300742.flavor: [Falco... Did she really become a Muzisitter?]
300742.name: Witch Cadet Fade

300743.flavor: [Look, knights. Chimu and Chimyu will help you out. I'm going to look for Luthica.]
300743.kr_flavor: [기사단원들이 보여, 치무와 치뮤는 기사단원들을 도와줘. 난 루티카를 찾아볼게]
300743.name: Knight's Assistant Clarice

300744.flavor: [Our national strength is our stamina! Hey you, stop messing around and talking about charm!]
300744.kr_flavor: [체력은 국력이다! 거기, 농땡이 피우면서 매력이라고 말하지 마!]
300744.name: Knight Staff Sergeant Seyfarf

300745.flavor: [This is no ordinary technique. The flag technique is jujutsu.]
300745.kr_flavor: [이건 평범한 기술이 아닙니다. 깃발의 기술 유술입니다.]
300745.name: Special Flag Bearer Frett

300746.flavor: [Whew~ I love the wind that pierces and swallows up my body!]
300746.kr_flavor: [휘유~ 내 몸을 관통하는, 나를 집어삼킬 듯한 바람, 정말 마음에 들어!]
300746.name: Wind Witch

300747.flavor: [By the Mother Demon's command, seeds of beautiful flowers will be scattered throughout this world.]
300747.kr_flavor: [마더데몬 님이 분부하신 대로 이 세계에 아름다운 꽃의 씨앗을 퍼뜨립시다.]
300747.name: Mother Demon's Agent

300748.flavor: [I will show my enemies the dance of death.]
300748.name: Scardel Unit Dualgun

300749.flavor: [I don't know anything about math or science, but what are you planning to do to my students? Do you want to find out how I'm also an idiot who doesn't know how to deal with you painlessly?]
300749.kr_flavor: [수학이니 과학이니 그런 건 잘 모르지만, 우리 학생들한테 무슨 짓이지? 난 아프지 않게 다루는 법도 모르는 바보니까 각오하라구?]
300749.name: Vita Guardian Gart

300750.flavor: [Gart, the stargazing bird. She is the guardian of Vita Public School, watching from the highest place where she can see the farthest things.]
300750.kr_flavor: [성견조 갓트. 그녀는 가장 높은 곳에 있고 가장 높은 곳에서 볼 수 있으며 가장 멀리 볼 수 있는 비타학교의 성수이다.]
300750.name: Star Bird Gart

300751.flavor: [Sita, isn't this place and the scenery nice?] [This cake is good...]
300751.kr_flavor: [시타 여기 너무 상쾌하고 경치 좋지 않니?][이 케이크 맛있어...]
300751.name: Sita and Vernika

300752.flavor: [Going for a walk and getting a change in surroundings isn't too bad. I'll bring Panica and Cannelle next time.]
300752.kr_flavor: [이렇게 기분전환 겸 산책도 나쁘진 않네요. 다음에는 페니카들도 같이 데려와야겠네요.]
300752.name: Flower Cinia

300753.flavor: [Miss Ophelia is really talented. I'll cherish these clothes for a long time.]
300753.kr_flavor: [오필리어 양께선 정말 재주도 좋으시네요. 이 옷은 소중히 간직할게요.]
300753.name: Hanbok Knight Pintail

300754.flavor: [All the candy and snacks are mine! Why don't you hand it all over before I give you a taste of something frightening?]
300754.kr_flavor: [사탕, 과자는 이 몸의 것이라고! 무서운 맛보기 전에 순순히 내놓는 게 좋을걸?]
300754.name: Halloween Rion Flina

300755.flavor: [Kana, I've heard of it, too. It's like a ghost story among the students of Vita Public School. Leave it to me, I'll start investigating immediately.]
300755.kr_flavor: [카나, 나도 들어본 적 있어. 공립에선 이전부터 괴담처럼 전해지던 전설이지. 맡겨만 준다면 당장 조사에 착수하지.]
300755.name: Asmis Hara

300756.flavor: [The events going on right now are like a plot out of a novel. I wonder if we are being affected by another world?]
300756.kr_flavor: [소설같은 이야기가 지금 일어나고 있군요. 어쩌면 우리는 지금 다른 세계선의 간섭을 받는 건 아닐까요?]
300756.name: Library Club Secretary Young

300757.flavor: [I will grant your request for eternal sleep. I don't know how it will turn out, though.]
300757.kr_flavor: [당신에게 영원한 잠의 선물을 드리겠어요. 잘 될지는 사실 저도 모르겠군요.]
300757.name: Celine Hastur

300758.flavor: [It's my job to find a compromise between your desired price and the actual worth.]
300758.kr_flavor: [당신이 원하는 목표의 이상과 현실의 타협점을 조정하는 것이 제 일이랍니다.]
300758.name: Lady Rivelta Answer

300760.flavor: [When I close my eyes, I feel like someone is desperately searching for me.]
300760.name: Insomniac Lady

300761.flavor: [ZZZ] [Special information: She doesn't understand what a knight does. -Knight Personnel Record]
300761.kr_flavor: [ZZZ] [특이사항 : 기사가 무엇인지 모르는 것 같음-기사단의 인사기록부]
300761.name: Knight Guard Canaria

300762.flavor: [It's finally finished! I wonder what Rain will think when she sees this?]
300762.kr_flavor: [드디어 완성했어요! 레인은 이걸 보고 어떻게 생각해줄까요?]
300762.name: Seeker Irene

300763.flavor: [The Blue Cross has contacted the guardian. I saw it with my own eyes, Captain Jaina.]
300763.kr_flavor: [청십자회가 성수와 접촉했다는군요. 직접 가서 확인하겠습니다. 제이나님]
300763.name: Crux Knight Pipit

300764.flavor: [I'll visit Vita Public School to see for myself if the rumors from Bakery City were true!]
300764.kr_flavor: [베이커리 시티에서 명문으로 소문난 비타학교 제가 직접 견학해 보겠습니다!]
300764.name: Witch Exchange Student Parfunte

300765.flavor: [This, that... Why is it that whenever I'm so close to getting results, it gets so loud outside...]
300765.kr_flavor: [이런 이런… 모처럼 연구의 성과가 나오려던 찰나였는데 바깥이 왜 이리 소란스러운 거야...]
300765.name: Crescent Woodbridge

300767.flavor: [I just like the silence. So, could you please leave? I want to be alone.]
300767.kr_flavor: [전 이 고요함을 즐길 뿐입니다. 그러니 모두 나가주시겠어요? 혼자 있고 싶습니다.]
300767.name: Coin Outcast

300768.flavor: [That's right. Castram can definitely win it. But, my duty right now isn't to win, but to survive. And... Ah, nevermind.]
300768.kr_flavor: [그래요. 카스트람이라면 이길 수도 있겠죠. 하지만, 지금 내 임무는 승리가 아닌 생존입니다. 그리고... 아,아닙니다.]
300768.name: Elleon and Sita

300769.flavor: [Truxica's furor affects the two sisters differently. It's like this for the younger sister, and... Yes, it's like the innocence of a child.]
300769.kr_flavor: [트룩시카의 광기는 두 자매에게 각각 다르게 이어졌다네. 동생에게는 뭐랄까... 그래, 어린아이와 같은 순수한 광기랄까.]
300769.name: May and Cinia

300770.flavor: [With a single gesture, the waves crash. With a single breath, the sea breeze blows. With her fury, typhoons rage. She is the queen of the sea. Her name is Tinia.]
300770.kr_flavor: [그녀의 손짓이 파도를 만들며 그녀의 숨결이 바닷바람이 되어버린다. 그녀의 분노는 폭풍우를 부르게 된다. 대양의 가운데 홀로 존귀한 바다의 여왕. 그녀의 이름은 티니아.]
300770.name: Tinia and Luthica

300771.flavor: [Boring... it's so boring! I can't stand it anymore. Why the hell should I have to be confined here? Why do those people treat my eyes like fanatics! It's unfair and makes me so mad!]
300771.kr_flavor: [따분해... 따분하다고! 도저히 못 참겠어. 도대체 왜 내가 이 방안에 갇혀 있어야 하는 건데. 왜 저 멍청한 백성은 내 눈을 광신도처럼 따라 하는 건데! 정말 불공평하고 화가 치밀어 오른다고!]
300771.name: Audry and Iri

300772.flavor: [Whew... When will I be free from this long curse... And today's request is...?]
300772.kr_flavor: [후… 이 지긋지긋한 저주의 주박에서 언제쯤 해방이 되는것인지… 그래서 오늘의 의뢰는 뭐지…?]
300772.name: Sleep Club Advisor Init

300773.flavor: [You're awake? It's a big problem if a lady like you sleeps outside in this cold weather dressed like that. Have some hot cocoa. It will warm you up.]
300773.kr_flavor: [정신은 드셨나요? 이런 추운 날씨에 숙녀분께서 그런 복장으로 주무시고 계시면 큰일 나요. 따뜻한 코코아로 몸 좀 녹이시면 한결 나아지실 거에요.]
300773.name: Treanna

300774.flavor: [Mnya... Mnya... I can't eat any more... Hehehe...]
300774.name: Sleep Club President Prinny

300775.flavor: [You're not alone. I will be your strength!]
300775.name: Muzisitter Tibouchina

300776.flavor: [Isn't it natural that the leader makes her appearance last? Tada, Flora is here!]
300776.kr_flavor: [원래 리더는 마지막에 등장하는 법이잖아? 쨔쟌, 플로라 등장!]
300776.name: Muzisitter Flora

300777.flavor: [Are you alright, master Linia? They took your sword, and you can't even leave the mansion...] [Huhu, it's alright. I've already played my part.]
300777.kr_flavor: [리니아님 괜찮으신가요? 검도 빼앗기고 저택 밖을 나가지 못하고 계시는데…][후후, 괜찮아요. 제 역할은 이미 끝났어요.]
300777.name: Confined Lady Linia

300779.flavor: [Are these all of the artifacts? Find more artifacts. Find enough to make Irene happy!]
300779.kr_flavor: [아티팩트는 이게 전부인가요? 더 많은 아티팩트를 내놓으세요. 이레네님이 기뻐할 만큼 내놓으세요!]
300779.name: Seeker Melissa

300780.flavor: [I can sense energy here different from that of artifacts. This... feels like Nexia's energy.]
300780.kr_flavor: [여기서 아티팩트와는 다른 신성한 기운이 느껴져요. 이건.... 넥시아님에 가까운 기운이에요.]
300780.name: Seeker Odien

300781.flavor: [I have no interest in ordinary people. It's my job to find espers, witches, and time-travelers and provide them a suitable place to live.]
300781.kr_flavor: [평범한 사람들에겐 관심 없습니다.  초능력자,마녀, 미래인을 찾아 그 재능을 살릴 수 있는 마땅한 곳을 제공하는 것이 저의 역할 입니다. ]
300781.name: Mediating Shaman

300782.flavor: [God... demons... I don't care about any of those... I'll give those people who separated me from my sister what they deserve.]
300782.kr_flavor: [신… 악마… 그런 것 따위엔 흥미없어… 나와 언니 사이를 방해하는 자들에겐 마땅한 대가를 치르게 해줄거야.]
300782.name: Avenger Stigma Flinte

300783.flavor: [This journey is really tough... It's a big problem... Everyone is becoming exhausted one by one...]
300783.kr_flavor: [이번 여정은 너무나도 험난하군요… 큰일이에요… 슬슬 다들 지쳐가고 있으니...]
300783.name: Scardel Chardonnay

300786.flavor: [Do you understand my loneliness? Yes. Thank you for listening!]
300786.kr_flavor: [너무 외로워 구공아 넌 내 마음 알지? 응. 알아줘서 고마워!]
300786.name: Lonely Basketball Club Member Ren

300787.flavor: [The Sleep Cl... ub... ZzZ] [zZz is recruiting... Zzz]
300787.name: Sleep Club Soulmate

300789.flavor: [Master... I'm full... I can't eat any more..... Zzzzz.....]
300789.name: Narcoleptic Maid

300790.flavor: [Huhu... The tea smells nice. Rosie, come here. The tea tastes better if we have it together.]
300790.kr_flavor: [후훗…차 향이 좋네요. 로시, 로시도 이리 오세요. 차는 같이 마셔야 더 맛있는 법이에요.]
300790.name: Lady Lucy

300791.flavor: [Quivering heart!] [Blazing heat!] [Fluttering rhythm of your heartbeat!]
300791.name: Muzisitter Duo

300793.flavor: [I'll point this gun at your head and pull the trigger. If you survive, I'll tell you something good. Huhu.]
300793.kr_flavor: [총구를 머리에 대고 이 방아쇠를 당겨봐요. 살아남으시면 좋은 걸 알려드리죠. 후후.]
300793.name: Blue Cross Jainier

300794.flavor: [Sister, if I beat up that cat, will you give me some of the macaroons we bought in Bakery Town?] [Alright, I'll give you some, but that's not a cat.]
300794.kr_flavor: [언니, 저기 내가 저 고양이 쓰러뜨리면 베이커리 마을에서 산 마카롱 줄거야?][알았어 줄께, 그리고 저거 고양이 아니야.]
300794.name: Knight Ria and Rien

300795.flavor: [This place... also doesn't have anyone worthy... Hm? Wait a second... It's over 9000?]
300795.kr_flavor: [이런… 여기에도 마땅한 사람은 없는것 같군요… 응? 잠깐 잘못봤겠지… 순간 9000이 넘어간 것 같았는데?]
300795.name: GS Scouter

300796.flavor: [We'll be at the forgotten paradise soon... I guess I don't need to tell everyone the truth about it before we get there.]
300796.kr_flavor: [곧 있으면 잊혀진 낙원에 도착할 것 같네요… 그전에 모두들에게 그 낙원에 숨겨진 진실에 대해서 알려줘야 할지도 모르겠네요. ]
300796.name: Crescent Kris Flina

300797.flavor: [Are you still waiting for the old full moon? How pathetic.]
300797.kr_flavor: [아직도 낡은 달이 떠오르길 기다리고 계신가요? 불쌍하신 분들이네요]
300797.name: Vinho Flina

300798.flavor: [You, that arm... Why do you protect it as if it belongs to you? Listen up, that sort of thing isn't meant for lowly people like you.]
300798.kr_flavor: [너의 그 팔… 왜 자신의 것인양 지키려고 하지? 내놔라, 그것은 너 같은 미천한 존재가 가지고 있을 것이 아니다.]
300798.name: Self-Righteous Sigma

300799.flavor: [You can't handle that power. If you don't have the responsibility or determination, then you have no right to wield it!]
300799.kr_flavor: [그것은 그대가 감당할 수 있는 힘이 아니다. 책임도 각오도 부족하다면, 그대에게 그 힘을 소지할 자격따윈 없다!]
300799.name: Pegasus Sigma

300800.flavor: [I hope everyone can get along in the new year. And I want to eat good food, too...]
300800.kr_flavor: [새해에는 모두가 사이좋게 지냈으면 좋겠어. 그리고 맛있는 것도 많이 먹고 싶어...]
300800.name: L. Hanbok Sita

300801.flavor: [Hm? I don't really have anything in particular to wish for. After all, there's nothing I can't obtain with just a simple gesture, right? Well, if you insist...]
300801.kr_flavor: [글쎄요? 딱히 바라는 것 따윈 없어요. 어차피 제 손짓 하나면 이루지 못할 일은 없는걸요? 그래도 굳이 꼽자면...]
300801.name: L. Hanbok Cinia

300802.flavor: [I hope the atmosphere of the knights and Crux improves. I want everyone to be able to relax and perform their duties.]
300802.kr_flavor: [하루라도 빨리 기사단과 교국의 분위기가 안정되었으면 좋겠어요. 그래야 모두 안심하고 임무를 수행할 수 있을 테니까요.]
300802.name: L. Hanbok Luthica

300803.flavor: [Um... I'm a bit embarrassed. I hope everyone's wishes can come true. I guess that's my wish?]
300803.kr_flavor: [으흠… 쑥스럽군. 새해에는 다들 이루고자 하는 소원을 꼭 이루길 바라네. 내 소원 말인가?]
300803.name: L. Hanbok Iri

300804.flavor: [This year's outsider is pretty cute, but why did it have to be snakes? Ugh, I don't like it. -Esprit]
300804.kr_flavor: [올해의 에트랑제는 참 귀엽게 생겼는데 말이야 왜 하필 뱀을 데리고 다니는 거야? 으, 기분 나빠. -이스프릿]
300804.name: Year of the Snake

300805.flavor: [The snakes are getting bigger... I hate it. I'm going to tell this outsider to go away. -Esprit]
300805.name: Serpent Incarnation

300806.flavor: [The sole survivor of the battle was the sister of Eixir L'Teft. It's unknown if Eixir L'Teft is her real name.]
300806.kr_flavor: [전쟁에서 살아남은 1인 에익시르 라테프트의 동생. 에익시르 라테프트란 이름이 그러하듯 그녀의 본명 또한 알 수 없다.]
300806.name: Eixir L'Teft

300807.flavor: [These accessories are really amazing. I feel like I can fly anywhere!]
300807.kr_flavor: [무척이나 신기한 장신구네. 왠지 어디로든지 날아갈 수 있을듯한 기분이 들어!]
300807.name: Asmis Ver. Basic

300808.flavor: [Mm... where am I? My head feels a little fuzzy, so it feels like I'm still dreaming.]
300808.kr_flavor: [으음… 여긴 어디지? 뭔가 머리가 멍한 게 아직도 꿈속에 있는 기분이야.]
300808.name: Asmis Ver. Morning

300809.flavor: [Tada! What do you think? I tried to look like a valley squirrel. I don't have any acorns to nibble on, but don't I look cute? I like how fluffy this tail feels, too.]
300809.kr_flavor: [짜잔! 어때? 산골짜기 다람쥐를 따라 해봤지. 도토리 점심은 없지만, 귀엽지 않아? 이 꼬리도 푹신푹신해서 기분 좋다고.]
300809.name: Asmis Ver. Animal Ears

300810.flavor: [It's... it's not like I like these clothes or anything! I just had the courtesy to wear them at least once since they were handmade.]
300810.kr_flavor: [난 단건 벼…별로 안 좋아한단 말야! 뭐 직접 만든거라면 예의상 한 입 정돈 먹어 볼 순 있어.]
300810.name: Linus Ver. Basic

300811.flavor: [Muzisitters have a really tough job... there are always troublemakers around at night and during the day... I can't show them this weak appearance.]
300811.kr_flavor: [뮤지시터란 참으로 곤란한 직업이야… 밤에도 낮에도 항상 세상을 어지럽히는 존재들고 맞서야 하니까… 그렇다고 여기서 약한 모습을 보일 순 없어.]
300811.name: Linus Ver. Morning

300812.flavor: [It.. it's tough for me if you look at me like that... Do I look small and cute?]
300812.kr_flavor: [그… 그런 따뜻한 표정으로 봐주면 내가 곤란하단 말야… 작고 깜찍하지 않아?...]
300812.name: Linus Ver. Animal Ears

300813.flavor: [These are really strange wings. Do they really work? If they do, then I'd want to give them to all of our members, too.]
300813.kr_flavor: [매우 이색적인 날개네요. 이건 실제로도 작동 가능한 건가요? 가능하다면 저희 단원들에게도 하나씩 지급해주고 싶네요.]
300813.name: Rose Ver. Basic

300814.flavor: [Where is this... I don't remember coming here. Do you know where this is?]
300814.kr_flavor: [여긴 도대체… 어째서 제가 여기에 와있는지 기억이 나질 않아요. 혹시 여기가 어딘지 알고 계신가요?]
300814.name: Rose Ver. Morning

300815.flavor: [Eh? This is a school uniform? I'm curious where students wear this as a uniform... more importantly, is this headband a part of the uniform, too?]
300815.kr_flavor: [에엣? 이게 요즘 학생들의 교복이라고요? 어디에 학생 교복인지 궁금하네요… 그보다 이 머리띠 교복에 같이 포함되는 건가요?]
300815.name: Rose Ver. Animal Ears

300816.flavor: [I still need to calm my heart. Once I've made peace with my decision, I will turn everything around again.]
300816.kr_flavor: [아직은 좀 더 마음의 안정이 필요할 것 같아요. 제 결심과 마음이 안정된다면, 제가 모든 것을 다시 돌려놓겠어요.]
300816.name: Helena Ver. Basic

300817.flavor: [I'm saving this letter to write about all the truths that I've seen and felt. Time will reveal  who the abnormalities are.]
300817.kr_flavor: [제가 보고 느낀 진실을 담아 이 편지지에 남길 겁니다. 정말로 그릇된 자가 누구인지는 시간이 알려줄 거에요.]
300817.name: Helena Ver. Morning

300818.flavor: [Th... this is embarrassing, as I expected... but if it makes a lot of people happy, then I'm a little happy, too.]
300818.kr_flavor: [이…이런 모습은 부끄럽네요. 역시… 그래도 이렇게 해서라도 많은 분들이 즐거워 주신다면, 저 역시 조금은 기쁠 거에요.]
300818.name: Helena Ver. Animal Ears

300819.flavor: [How do I look? It's been a while since I've dressed up for an event. One of the two most anticipated events is almost here. The chocolate festival is starting soon.]
300819.kr_flavor: [어떤가요? 오랜만에 행사라 차려입어 봤어요. 한해 제일 기대되는 두 행사 중 하나가 곧 시작한다고 하네요. 초콜릿 축제가 곧 시작된답니다.]
300819.name: Isfeldt Ver. Basic

300820.flavor: [On refreshing mornings like these, morning tea and sweet chocolate go perfectly together... How about it? Will you have an elegant tea time with me?]
300820.kr_flavor: [이런 상쾌한 아침에는 모닝 티와 함께 달콤한 초콜릿이 어울릴 텐데… 어떠신가요? 함께 우아한 티타임을 가져 볼까요?]
300820.name: Isfeldt Ver. Morning

300821.flavor: [Meow~ How's that? Actually, it's really dangerous to give cats chocolate, so you have to be very careful. Of course, I'll always welcome it.]
300821.kr_flavor: [야옹~ 어떤가요? 실제로 고양이에게 초콜릿을 주면 매우 위험하니 특별히 주의하셔야 해요. 저야 물론 언제나 환영이죠.]
300821.name: Isfeldt Ver. Animal Ears

300822.flavor: [128√e980 might mean something if you modify it somehow.]
300822.kr_flavor: [128√e980 뭔가 의미가 있는 수식이라고 하는데 모르겠어요.]
300822.name: Library Club Head Researcher Von

300823.flavor: [Senpai, do you know about Jormungand? It's a snake that protects the earth.] [Eh? I thought it was something else?] [Senpai! I understand the logic of all creation, so there's no way I could be wrong.]
300823.kr_flavor: [선배 요르문간드라고 아시나요? 대지를 지키는 뱀이랍니다.][에? 그게 아니지 않나요?] [선배! 삼라만상을 깨우친 제가 잘못됐다는 건가요?]
300823.name: Serpent Nanai

300825.flavor: [Everyone in the mansion has been avoiding me lately.] [Huhu... I made a potion just for you. Won't you try it?]
300825.kr_flavor: [요즘 저택에 사람들이 절 피하고 있어요][후후..그런 당신을 위해서 준비한 이 약, 드셔보실래요?]
300825.name: Maid Guard and Cultist

300826.flavor: [How could I wear this...] [Didn't you hear that those who don't work don't eat?]
300826.kr_flavor: [어째서 제가 이런…][일하지 않는 자 먹지말라 몰라?]
300826.name: Maid Ophelia

300827.flavor: [What are you looking at? Haven't you seen someone getting dressed before?]
300827.name: Preparing Lady Cinia

300828.flavor: [The chaos within Crux has been increasing lately... At this rate, I'll need the help of the knights.]
300828.kr_flavor: [요즘 교국내의 혼란이 가속되고 있어요. 이럴 때일수록 기사단 여러분의 도움이 필요해요.]
300828.name: Connecting Shaman Nexia

300829.flavor: [These clothes... er... am I... getting married?] [Sister, you have to after you get discharged.] [On her 1132nd night in this place, she had a girl's impossible sweet dream.]
300829.kr_flavor: [이 옷은…헛…나...결혼하는 건가?][언니, 전역부터 하셔야죠.][그녀의 1132일째 밤은 이곳에선 결코 맛볼 수 없는 소녀의 달콤한 꿈이었다.]
300829.name: Wedding Dress Pintail

300830.flavor: [Miss Luthica, what are you doing?] [Just taking a break.]
300830.name: Waiting Knight Luthica

300831.flavor: [It's been a while, my friends! I see you've been well. You're slowly making your way over here, aren't you?]
300831.kr_flavor: [오랜만이야 내 친구들! 잘들 지내고 있는 걸 보니 이제 슬슬 이쪽으로 올 때가 가까워진 것 같은데?]
300831.name: Undertaker

300832.flavor: [I have the right answer. I'll reveal it after 60 seconds!]
300832.name: Quiz Queen Conundrum

300834.flavor: [It feels like yesterday since I first came to this world... It's already been this long... This place is really like a dream.]
300834.kr_flavor: [이 세계에 넘어온지도 엊그제 같은데… 벌써 시간이 이렇게 지나다니… 정말 여긴 꿈만 같아요.]
300834.name: L. Ophelia

300835.flavor: [You picked so suddenly. Don't tell me that your choice is the final word?] [....] [My dream...]
300835.kr_flavor: [갑자기 고르라니요. 설마 고른 말로 할 일이 결정된다거나 하지는 않죠?] […..] [나의 꿈이…]
300835.name: New Student Council Member Hine

300836.flavor: [Why am I even the vice president?]
300836.name: Student Council Tieria

300837.flavor: [What's this? It feels like I have the power of sound at my fingertips.]
300837.kr_flavor: [이건 뭐죠? 이 손 끝의 느낌 귀의 울림 마법에 걸린 것 같아요]
300837.name: Student Council Fran

300838.flavor: [It's hard to see any light, but I did a lot of good experiments. I like it.]
300838.kr_flavor: [빛을 보기 힘들어지긴 했지만 좋은 실험체는 많아졌어. 마음에 들어.]
300838.name: Lady Elbert

300839.flavor: [... Leave the mansion's peace and master Cinia's safety to me.] [That's enough!]
300839.kr_flavor: […저택의 평화와 시니아님의 안전은 제게 맡겨주세요.][더는 그만둬!]
300839.name: Dress Up Guard

300840.flavor: [I'm the Muzisitter of sparkling love! Lilac!]
300840.name: Muzisitter Lilac

300841.flavor: [Christina, what are you doing?] [Se, senpai, sorry!]
300841.name: Seeker Christina

300843.flavor: [Did you come because it hurts somewhere? Oh my, does your heart hurt? Lie down here. I'll cure you.]
300843.kr_flavor: [어디가 편찮으셔서 오셨나요? 어머 마음이 아프시다고요? 여기 누워보세요. 제가 치료해드릴게요.]
300843.name: Knight Medic

300844.flavor: [This place is like 2D maze turned 3D. It's such an elaborate labyrinth... Be careful not to lose your way.]
300844.kr_flavor: [여기는 마치 평면 미궁을 입체화시킨 듯한 느낌이 들어요. 이렇게 정교하게 짜여진 미로라니… 길을 잃지 않도록 조심해야겠어요.]
300844.name: Crescent Maze

300845.flavor: [Because of that war, all of our company's assets got damaged. We have to hurry and replace our damaged things so we can open for business again...]
300845.kr_flavor: [저번 난리로 인해 회사의 기물들이 많이 파손됐어. 하루빨리 파손된 기물을 복구해야 다시 영업을 시작할 수 있을 텐데...]
300845.name: Night Witch Seriot

300846.flavor: [Are you trying to risk your life? You have a lot of courage to stand before me. Or rather than courage, maybe I should call it recklessness.]
300846.kr_flavor: [목숨을 걸어볼 텐가? 내 앞에 선 용기는 칭찬해주지. 허나 그런 헛된 용기를 사람들은 만용이라고 한다. ]
300846.name: GS 5th Star

300847.flavor: [Evil. Cleansing. Slash.] [Ever since Layna disappeared, compliance of regulations has been dropping. Casey took action in response.]
300847.kr_flavor: [악.즉.참.][레이나 실종 후 낮아지는 교칙 준수율을 잡기 위해 그녀가 움직였다.]
300847.name: Student Council Casey

300848.flavor: [What! Why is there a horse but no bird!?]
300848.kr_flavor: [뭐야! 왜 말은 있는데 새가 없는 거야!]
300848.name: Student Council Gart

300849.flavor: [The Student Council is too decadent...] [Here's some tea] [Ah! This is good... is not what I'm going to say! Stop petting me! You're the students, and I'm the teacher!]
300849.kr_flavor: [학생회가 방탕하단…][여기 홍차][아! 이거 맛있어요….가 아니잖아요! 쓰다듬지 마세요! 여러분은 학생이고 난 선생이에요!]
300849.name: Student Council Advisor

300850.flavor: [I'm the new maid, Royetta. Nice to meet you!]
300850.name: Maid Royetta

300851.flavor: [It's nice to be back, but I should bring Veltier with me.]
300851.kr_flavor: [이제 원래의 자리로 돌아온 기분이야, 그럼 이제 벨티에를 데려와야겠어.]
300851.name: Lady Rose

300852.flavor: [I'll do my best for master Cinia's safety.]
300852.name: Maid Anna

300853.flavor: [Huhu, won't you make a deal with me? I just want a little bit of information from you.]
300853.kr_flavor: [후후 어때요 저와 거래를 하지 않으시겠어요? 전 당신이 가진 아주 조금의 정보만 원하는데.]
300853.name: Blue Cross Noel

300854.flavor: [Did you think that money would be enough to buy this information? My little sister has tons of information in her notebook with that kind of worth.]
300854.kr_flavor: [이 정보가 돈이 되리라 생각하고 가져오신건가요? 이정도의 정보는 제 동생 수첩에도 잔뜩 있어요.]
300854.name: Blue Cross Florence

300855.flavor: [What's wrong? Did you come here because Riano is scary? What is she doing on the bed...]
300855.kr_flavor: [무슨 일로 오셨나요? 리아노 선생님이 무서워서 오셨다구요? 하여튼 그분은 침대에서 뭘 하시는건지...]
300855.name: Knight Medic Kamyu

300856.flavor: [The SPRING! The OPENING CEREMONY! How sad...]
300856.name: Witch Nytitch

300857.flavor: [Our first priority is rebuilding the order. Restoring the believers' faith will aid us in this task.]
300857.kr_flavor: [우선은 교단을 재건하는 게 급선무입니다. 선도들의 믿음이 깊어지는 만큼 저희 교단의 재건도 빨라질 거에요.]
300857.name: Apostle Yula

300858.flavor: [Eheh! Let Conundrum be your guide in the underground city! I came here once before with Kris, so follow me!]
300858.kr_flavor: [엣헴! 지하도시의 안내가이드를 맡은 코넌드럼 입니다. 이 지하도시는 이전에 한번 크리스님과 와본 적이 있으니 저만 따라오시면 돼요!]
300858.name: Explorer Crescent Conundrum

300859.flavor: [This candy house is like it's out of a fairy tale. I wonder if I can eat this?]
300859.kr_flavor: [마치 동화속에 나오는 과자의 집 같아요. 이거 먹어봐도 될까요?]
300859.name: Layna in Candyland

300860.flavor: [Trance Magical! The magical girl of love and justice Layna has appeared to protect the candy!]
300860.kr_flavor: [트랜스 매지컬! 사랑과 정의의 마법소녀 레이나 캔디를 지키기 위해 등장! ]
300860.name: Magical Layna in Candyland

300861.flavor: [Let's go to the land of magic! Take my hand and close your eyes, and we'll be there in an instant!]
300861.kr_flavor: [마법의 나라로 함께 떠나요! 제 손을 잡고 눈 한 번 감으면 순식간일걸요?]
300861.name: Magician Layna in Candyland

300862.flavor: [There's still a lot of things in this world that I don't know. I want to learn more... You look like you're qualified to come with me. How about it?]
300862.kr_flavor: [아직 이 세상은 내가 모르는 것 투성이야. 난 좀 더 이 세상에 대해 알아보고 싶은데… 너라면 나와 같이 갈 수 있는 자격이 있을거 같은데? 어때?]
300862.name: 4th Princess Aine

300863.flavor: [I'll be mad if you leave me out of the candy festival!]
300863.name: Isfeldt in Candyland

300864.flavor: [I won't forgive anyone who gets in the way of the candy festival. Mass Recall!]
300864.kr_flavor: [캔디페스티벌을 방해하는 나쁜 무리는 용서할 수 없어요. 매스리콜!]
300864.name: Isfeldt in Sugarland

300865.flavor: [A lot of incidents have been going on in Royle City lately... I have a bad feeling about this. It looks like it's time for me to act.]
300865.kr_flavor: [최근 로일시티에서 빈번히 발생하고 있는 사건들… 무언가 싫은 예감이 드는군. 아무래도 움직여야 할 때가 온 것 같네.]
300865.name: Royle Guardian Nold

300866.flavor: [You stand before a crossroads of decisions, traveler. I will test your determination.]
300866.kr_flavor: [선택의 기로에 선 모험가여. 그대의 결심을 확인하겠노라.]
300866.name: Gold Lion Nold

300867.flavor: [Everyone came to have fun? Then I'll celebrate, too... Let's have fun in the future...]
300867.kr_flavor: [다들 기뻐해 주러 온 거야? 그럼 나도 같이 축하해 줄게… 앞으로도 많이 놀러 와줘...]
300867.name: 2nd Anniversary Sita

300868.flavor: [When everyone is so happy, I can't help but get drawn into it. I'm congratulating you especially, so be thankful. Take this cake.]
300868.kr_flavor: [오늘같이 기쁜 날 제가 빠질 순 없죠. 제가 특별히 축하해줄 테니 감사히 받도록 하세요. 이 케이크는 잘 먹도록 하죠.]
300868.name: 2nd Anniversary Cinia

300869.flavor: [This is a very special day. Of course we'll share the festive spirit. Congratulations!]
300869.kr_flavor: [오늘은 정말 기념적인 날이에요. 여러분과 저희의 축하 마음, 분명 전해질 거에요. 축하해요!]
300869.name: 2nd Anniversary Luthica

300870.flavor: [I can smell something warm and nostalgic... Let's be together in the future, too...]
300870.kr_flavor: [어쩐지 정말 정겹고도 그리운 냄새가 나는듯하군… 앞으로도 쭉 함께 할 수 있다면 기쁠 텐데...]
300870.name: 2nd Anniversary Iri

300872.flavor: [Two years old? It's still no~thing compared to me, but I'll congratulate you anyway!]
300872.kr_flavor: [이제 두살? 아직 이 몸에 비하면 한~참 멀었지만 오늘은 특별한 날이니 같이 축하해줄게!]
300872.name: 2nd Anniversary Cannelle

300873.flavor: [I'm off-duty today... If you keep interrupting my personal time, I'll have you arrested...]
300873.kr_flavor: [오늘은 비번이라고… 자꾸 이렇게 개인정비시간을 방해한다면 체포해버리겠어...]
300873.name: Morning Seresty

300874.flavor: [Ah... I can't see. Mm?! This situation is just like Halloween. It's a conspiracy!]
300874.kr_flavor: [아…….안 보여. 음?! 이 상황 할로윈과 비슷한데 음모인가!]
300874.name: Animal Suit Asmis

300875.flavor: [It had been a long time since Esprit last looked through the crystal ball, so she couldn't take her eyes off.]
300875.kr_flavor: [오랜만에 본 수정구에 이스프릿은 눈을 뗄 수 없었다.]
300875.name: Sword Girls Asmis

300876.flavor: [Do you like carrots?] [I don't like carrots, but it's okay if it's just a prop.]
300876.name: Animal Suit Linus

300878.flavor: [Rose, can I touch your fluffy place?] [Huh? Fluffy place?]
300878.kr_flavor: [로제님, 로제님의 그 푹신푹신한 곳, 눌러봐도 될까요?][네? 푹신푹신한 곳이요?]
300878.name: Animal Suit Rose

300880.flavor: [I'm getting absorbed in the smell of spring and the refreshing sun. If there is a heaven on earth, wouldn't it be here?]
300880.kr_flavor: [싱그러운 햇살에 이끌려 나와보니 저도 모르는 사이에 봄 내음에 취해 버렸네요. 이 세상에 낙원이 존재한다면, 바로 여기가 아닐까요?]
300880.name: Animal Suit Helena

300881.flavor: [The curtains have been raised for our journey to a new world.]
300881.kr_flavor: [앞으로 벌어질 새로운 세계의 이야기의 새로운 막이 올랐다.]
300881.name: Sword Girls Helena

300882.flavor: [Oh? What a cute little kid. Wouldn't it be a shame if you left as soon as you came? It's a shame, but if you leave now, you won't be able to come and go freely. How about it? Come over here and play a game with me. If you win, I'll grant one of your wishes.]
300882.kr_flavor: [어라 귀여운 꼬마 손님이네. 들어오자마자 나가려 하다니 섭섭한걸? 아쉽지만 나갈 때는 마음대로 못 나가겠는걸? 어때? 이리 와서 누나랑 같이 재미있는 게임 한 번 해보지 않을래? 내게 이긴다면 꼬마가 원하는 소원 하나 들어줄게.]
300882.name: Darkness Queen Nold

300883.flavor: [It's only natural for us to have a secret weapon. We'll be able to turn the tables like this.]
300883.kr_flavor: [비장의 수단 정도는 갖추어두는 게 당연하지 않나. 그래야 이럴 때 써먹을 수 있으니 말이지.]
300883.name: Advancing Sigma

300884.flavor: [I'll show you my skills.] [Yes. I'm watching.] [Don't look anywhere weird.]
300884.kr_flavor: [제 솜씨를 제대로 보여드리겠습니다.] [응. 잘 보이네.] [이상한 곳을 보지 말아주세요!]
300884.name: Library Club Explorer Milka

300886.flavor: [Sorry for making you do something like this, Veltier, but you'll be safe here.] [...]
300886.kr_flavor: [이런 일 시켜서 미안해요 벨티에, 하지만 이곳은 안전할 거에요.][…]
300886.name: Maid Veltier

300887.flavor: [Aimi, what's that book? And what's with this candlelight?] [I found a rare occult book. You have to read rare books like this in this kind of atmosphere.]
300887.kr_flavor: [아이미, 그 책은 뭐야? 이 촛불들은 뭐고?][귀한 오컬트 책을 구했어. 이런 귀한 책은 이런 분위기에서 읽어야지.]
300887.name: Occult Lady Aimi

300888.flavor: [Terra, why did you join the knights if you hate fighting?] [I thought the knights' swords were cool...]
300888.kr_flavor: [데이라 너 싸우기 싫다면서 기사단엔 왜 온거야?][기사단의 검이 멋있어서요...]
300888.name: Crux Knight Terra

300889.flavor: [I'm worried. We did everything right. Should I tell them the results?]
300889.kr_flavor: [불안해요, 저희가 옳은 방향으로 가고 있는지. 모든건 결과가 말해주겠죠?]
300889.name: Seeker Amethystar

300890.flavor: [Conundrum was talking about it, so I didn't really have very high expectations, but this is actually a pretty nice place. I didn't know that Conundrum could be reliable every now and then.]
300890.kr_flavor: [코넌드럼이 말한 곳이라 큰 기대는 하지 않았는데, 예상외로 괜찮은 곳이군요. 코넌드럼도 가끔은 올바른 말도 할 줄 아는군요.]
300890.name: Crescent Nytimber

300891.flavor: [A rectangle within a rectangle within a rectangle... This place almost crosses the boundary of sense and nonsense.]
300891.kr_flavor: [사각형 내부의 사각형 내부의 사각형… 마치 상식과 비상식의 경계선상을 보는듯하군.]
300891.name: Crescent Puzzle

300892.flavor: [If I use this flour, even those girls who only like bread and cookies will be satisfied.]
300892.kr_flavor: [이 밀가루 요리라면 빵과 과자를 좋아하는 아이들도 만족해주겠지.]
300892.name: Cook Club Sylphie

300893.flavor: [I've come to this place... will I be able to see any ghosts...?]
300893.kr_flavor: [이런곳까지 오다니... 못해도 유령 한번 즈음 본 적 있겠지...?]
300893.name: Occultist Ling Ling

300894.flavor: [If your sword hesitates, it's because your heart hesitates.]
300894.kr_flavor: [검에 망설임이 있다면 그것은 곧 자신의 마음에 망설임이 있다는 것입니다.]
300894.name: Crux Knight Fleta

300896.flavor: [I'm not good at this kind of service, but today is Special Service Time!]
300896.kr_flavor: [이런 서비스 웬만해선 잘 안하지만, 오늘만은 특별서비스타임!]
300896.name: Queen Peia Bray

300897.flavor: [Hm... I'm not really interested in the things that the people in that world use, but this is quite surprising. Those skill users who have awakened their spiritual abilities are granted special powers... isn't it thrilling?]
300897.kr_flavor: [흐응… 저쪽 세계에서 쓰는 물건에는 큰 관심이 없었는데, 이건 정말 놀랍군. 적성자의 영적 능력을 각성시켜 주어 특별한 힘을 부여해준다니… 오싹오싹한데? ]
300897.name: Empire Head Researcher Query

300898.kr_flavor: [하앙? 네 혼, 딸기맛 나는 거 같은데?]
300898.name: Devil

300899.flavor: [Always look inside books. It will be in books. It could be in this book or that book. If you want to achieve your hopes, it will be inside books.]
300899.kr_flavor: [언제나 책 속에서 찾고 있어요. 어딘가 있을 책 속을. 이 책 속에도 저 책 속에도 있을 리 없는데. 혹시 소원이 이루어진다면 책 속으로]
300899.name: Library Club Dreamer Gana

300900.flavor: [Always look inside dreams. It will be in dreams. It could be possible to sleep on the sofa in this room.]
300900.kr_flavor: [언제나 꿈을 찾고 있어요. 어딘가 있을 꿈. 이 교실 소파에서는 꿈꿀 수 있을 수 없는데...]
300900.name: Sleep Club Dreamer Dara

300901.flavor: [It's time for astrology, master Cinia.] [Can you find whatever you want using astrology?] [Of course.]
300901.kr_flavor: [그럼, 시니아님. 이번에는 점성술 시간 입니다.][혹시, 점성술을 통해 원하는 것을 찾을 수도 있나요?][물론이죠.]
300901.name: Private Tutor Pana

300902.flavor: [Now, I must concentrate before reading the future...]
300902.kr_flavor: [그럼. 먼저, 점을 보기 전에 잠시 집중을...]
300902.name: Occult Lady Rika

300903.flavor: [Kya- so cute. It's so soft.] [Senpai, it hurts~]
300903.name: Forever the Youngest Knight

300904.flavor: [Be cautious. You must not anger the guardian of these ruins.]
300904.kr_flavor: [조심해. 절대 이 유적의 수호자분을 화나게 하면 안돼.]
300904.name: Seeker Explorer Odien

300905.flavor: [This summer is an endless heat wave! Don't lose all your energy!]
300905.kr_flavor: [올해 여름은 언제나 그렇듯이 폭염! 그렇다고 벌써 축 늘어질 순 없습니다! ]
300905.name: Aletheian C-EDA

300906.flavor: [Twilight comes, and night will soon fall. Sister, please wait until then.]
300906.kr_flavor: [황혼이 지고 곧 밤이 올겁니다. 언니 그때까지 조금만 기다려주세요.]
300906.name: GS 3rd Star

300907.flavor: [I'll grant you the special honor of satisfying me.]
300907.kr_flavor: [특별히 네 녀석의 입을 열 기회를 줄테니 나를 한 번 만족시켜보거라.]
300907.name: Anj Inyghem

300908.flavor: [Ahaha! Excellent! I like you! I want to have a taste!]
300908.kr_flavor: [아하핫! 흥분되는군! 네 녀석 정말 마음에 들어! 특별히 가장 마지막에 맛봐주도록 하지!]
300908.name: True Vampire God

300909.flavor: [Shall I show you my magic, which makes everything before me disappear? When I twirl this magic wand, everything in front of me will become nothing!]
300909.kr_flavor: [저 앞에 물건이 사라지는 마술 하나 보여드릴까요? 이 요술봉을 한 번 휘두르면 사라지지 않는 물건은 없는걸요!]
300909.name: Magic Wand Arat

300910.flavor: [The beach has a lot of artifacts... Want to go look together?]
300910.kr_flavor: [해변에 아티팩트가 많다고 하던데… 한 번 같이 찾아볼까요?]
300910.name: Seaside Luthica

300912.flavor: [It's as beautiful as I am. Not bad.]
300912.name: Holiday Linus

300915.flavor: [Even if it's hot, do you have to show off that useless meat?]
300915.name: Vacation Esprit

300916.flavor: [I can't swim, but I like it because it's cool.]
300916.name: Vacation Sita

300917.flavor: [How long are you just going to watch?]
300917.name: Vacation Cinia

300919.flavor: [You have to come to places like this with lots of people.]
300919.name: Vacation Iri

300920.flavor: [I don't know why Esprit hates the beach.]
300920.name: Vacation Rio

300921.flavor: [My schedule is free for a bit. A vacation is perfect.]
300921.kr_flavor: [당분간 맑을 예정이라네요. 바캉스에 딱 좋은 시기에요.]
300921.name: Vacation Rico

300923.flavor: [It's finished! As usual, the Empire's technology is the best on the continent!]
300923.kr_flavor: [완성이야! 역시 우리 제국의 기술력은 대륙 제일!]
300923.name: Empire Top Researcher Ariel

300924.flavor: [Do you want a flower? Then try solving this problem.]
300924.kr_flavor: [꽃을 받고 싶어? 그럼 이 문제를 풀어봐.]
300924.name: Bouquet Amrita

300926.flavor: [It's hot. Can I take this off?] [You can't.]
300926.name: Penguin Suit Sita

300927.flavor: [Luthica... what] [Isn't it nice to do this every now and then?]
300927.name: Maid Luthica

300928.flavor: [The so-called Heart Stone Witch's powers still aren't fully understood.]
300928.kr_flavor: [심장석의 마녀라 불리던 그녀의 힘에 대해서는 아직 알려진 것이 없다.]
300928.name: Witch Cadet Heart

300929.flavor: [Isn't it convenient being small? Right?] [... Absolutely]
300929.kr_flavor: [역시 작다는 건 편리한 것 같아? 그렇지 않아?][...전혀]
300929.name: Muzisitter Lady Flora

300930.flavor: [The lakeside is really refreshing on hot days... By the way, where are you looking?]
300930.kr_flavor: [더운날 호숫가는 정말 시원해요. …그런데 어딜 보시는 거죠?]
300930.name: Lotus Nexia

300931.flavor: [Have you seen a sword and a fat cat? Eh? It's a panda?]
300931.kr_flavor: [혹시 검고 흰 비만 고양이 보셨나요? 예? 팬더 아니냐구요?]
300931.name: Seeker Rin

300932.flavor: [My long journey is over... I'm back to work for Crux.]
300932.kr_flavor: [긴 방황 끝에 제이... 교국의 품으로 돌아왔습니다.]
300932.name: Jaina's Adjutant Luthica

300933.flavor: [Up until now, I've kept secret about being a witch to make sure I could continue my experiments. Maybe I've completed enough that I don't need to hide it anymore.]
300933.kr_flavor: [내가 여태까지 마녀임을 숨겨왔던것은 나의 실험에 추진력을 얻기 위함이었어. 이제 충분하니 더 이상 숨길필요 없겠지?]
300933.name: Witch Cultist

300935.flavor: [Even if I wear these clothes, I wouldn't become like her, but... still...]
300935.kr_flavor: [그 아이처럼 입는다고 그녀가 되돌아올 수 없다는건 잘 알고 있지만… 그래도...]
300935.name: Sita Clothes Iri

300936.flavor: [The Wind Clan is friends with the wind! You can be a friend too!]
300936.kr_flavor: [바람의 일족은 언제나 바람과 친구야! 너도 함께 친구가 되는 거다. 라비!]
300936.name: Wind Girl Hu

300937.flavor: [I invite the entire audience into a world of amazing magic. First, shall I move the stage?]
300937.kr_flavor: [지금부터 관객여러분들을 신비한 마술의 세계로 초대할게요. 우선은 간단하게 무대부터 옮겨볼까요?]
300937.name: Space Magician

300938.flavor: [Heads? Tails? Which side do you want?]
300938.name: Coin Child

300939.flavor: [Are you relieved that it missed? I wonder what you'll do in 1 second?]
300939.kr_flavor: [지금 빗나갔다고 안심하는거야? 당장 1초후에 어떻게 행동해야할지 생각해뒀어?]
300939.name: Single Action Bulletta

300940.flavor: [It'd be nice to go to the lake on this sunny day.]
300940.kr_flavor: [이런 화창한 날, 호수에 들어가면 기분이 좋아져요.]
300940.name: Mugi, Master of Arts

300941.flavor: [I hate boring things, so I've been looking for a place that's always interesting. Can you ease my boredom?]
300941.kr_flavor: [짐은 지루한 게 아주 싫어. 그러니 항상 재미있는 일이 어디 없나 찾아보는 거지. 너는 짐의 지루함을 달랠 수 있니?]
300941.name: Shiva Ain

300942.flavor: [It's so troublesome that there are so many idiots like Austidiot and Yushin. Whew...]
300942.kr_flavor: [바보틴이나 유신 씨 같은 바보들이 많아서 고생이에요. 후우…]
300942.name: First Empress Xiaomei

300943.flavor: [Okay, zero points. It's so delicious when you're ripened by my fury.]
300943.kr_flavor: [자, 빵점. 선생님 분노로 이글이글 바싹 익은 아주 맛있는 빵이야.]
300943.name: Final Boss Teacher Yuzu

300944.flavor: [Victory! Victory is mine! ... What, why are you looking at me like I'm an idiot? I'm not an idiot!]
300944.kr_flavor: [승부다! 이 몸과 승부를 하자! …뭐야, 그 바보를 보는 듯한 눈빛은? 이, 이 몸은 바보가 아니야!]
300944.name: Surt Grace

300945.flavor: [The A/S Workshop is always OPEN! Even if the world changes. This is the secret to success!]
300945.kr_flavor: [A/S공방은 휴일 제외 언제라도 OPEN! 세계가 바뀌어도 말이야. 그것이 대성공의 비결!]
300945.name: Genius Smith Asil

300947.flavor: [It's too bad, but I can't refuse. Offer me your blood. This is destiny.]
300947.kr_flavor: [아쉽게도 거부권은 없답니다. 당신은 본인에게 피를 선사한다. 이건 운명이에요.]
300947.name: Mephisto Elizabeth

300949.flavor: [We may have said it was the last, but we never said it was the end.]
300949.name: Extra Witness DPD

skill_text.100001: Turn Start: Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 3 of the enemy Field get STA -1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, an additional effect is applied. (Hidden effect: The enemy Character gets LIFE -1)
skill_text.100002: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, an additional effect is applied. (Hidden effect: The enemy Character gets LIFE -1)
skill_text.100003: Turn Start: A random Crux Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, an additional effect is applied. (Hidden effect: The enemy Character gets LIFE -1)
skill_text.100004: Turn Start: If the total SIZE of your Field is greater than the total SIZE of the enemy Field, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, an additional effect is applied. (Hidden effect: The enemy Character gets LIFE -1)
skill_text.100005: Turn Start: A random card in your Hand gets SIZE +1. If this happens, a random card on your Field with a SIZE of at least 2 gets SIZE -1.
skill_text.100006: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field with a SIZE greater than or equal to the number of cards on your Field get ATK +1/STA +2.
skill_text.100007: Turn Start: The Follower on the enemy Field with the highest DEF gets DEF=0.
skill_text.100008: Turn Start: All Followers on your Field with the lowest SIZE get ATK/STA increased by the difference between the SIZES of the card on your Field with the lowest SIZE and the card on the enemy Field with the highest SIZE.
skill_text.100009: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field that belongs to a different faction than this card gets ATK -2/STA -2. If there are no Followers with a different faction, 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get STA -1.
skill_text.100010: Turn Start: If there are at least 2 cards on the enemy Field, the first Follower on the enemy Field with the highest SIZE gets ATK -2/DEF -1/STA -2. If there is 1 card, the first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/STA +2.
skill_text.100011: Turn Start: The first Follower on the enemy Field with a SIZE less than or equal to the average SIZE of the first 2 cards in your Hand (rounding up) gets ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2.
skill_text.100012: Turn Start: If the difference between the SIZES of the first 2 cards in your Hand is odd, all Followers on your Field get STA +2. If it is even, all Followers on your Field get ATK +2.
skill_text.100013: Turn Start: If this card's LIFE and the SIZE of the first card in your Hand are both odd or both even, this card gets LIFE +3. Otherwise, the first card in your Hand gets SIZE -1.
skill_text.100014: Turn Start: A random Vita Follower on your Field with a SIZE of at least 2 gets SIZE decreased by 1 + the difference between the SIZES of the first 2 cards in your Hand (by a maximum of 3).
skill_text.100015: Turn Start: If there is no card in Slot 3 of the enemy Field, a random Follower on the enemy Field is moved to Slot 3 of the enemy Field. The Follower in Slot 3 of the enemy Field gets STA -3.
skill_text.100016: Turn Start: The first Follower on the enemy Field with the highest SIZE gets ATK/STA decreased by the average SIZE of the first Follower on your Field and the Follower in Slot 4 of your Field (rounding up).
skill_text.100017: Turn Start: The Follower in Slot 1 of your Field is moved to Slot 5 of your Field. The Follower in Slot 5 of your Field gets STA +4.
skill_text.100018: Turn Start: A random card in your Hand with a SIZE of at least 2 gets SIZE -1. If that card belongs to Darklore, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1.
skill_text.100019: Turn Start: If there are 3 or fewer cards in your Hand, all cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, all sent Followers and a random Vita Follower on your Field get ATK/STA increased by half the numer of cards sent (rounding down).
skill_text.100020: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets DEF decreased by the half ATK of the Follower in your Hand with the lowest SIZE (rounding down).
skill_text.100021: Turn Start: All Followers on the enemy Field with a SIZE less than the SIZE of the first Follower on your Field get ATK -1/STA -2.
skill_text.100022: Turn Start: If all cards on your Field and the first card in your Hand belong to Crux, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2.
skill_text.100023: Turn Start: The card in Slot 5 of the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If it is a Follower, it gets ATK -1. A random card on the enemy Field is moved to the next empty Slot. If the new Slot Number is 5, that card is destroyed.
skill_text.100024: Turn Start: The first card on your Field with the highest SIZE gets its SIZE set equal to the difference between the SIZES of the first 2 cards in the enemy Hand (no effect if there aren't at least 2 cards).
skill_text.100025: Turn Start: A random Darklore Follower on your Field with a SIZE of 9 or less is sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by 1.5 times the sent Follower's SIZE (rounding down).
skill_text.100026: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets the following effects depending on the faction of the first card in your Hand. ●Vita: ATK +1/STA +2. ●Academy: STA +3. ●Crux: DEF +1. ●Darklore: SIZE -2.
skill_text.100027: Turn Start: A random Crux Follower on your Field gets STA increased by the number of non-Crux cards or Crux cards in the enemy Hand and Field, whichever is higher.
skill_text.100028: Turn Start: If the enemy Hand and Field contains at least 2 different factions, a random card in your Hand gets SIZE -2.
skill_text.100029: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -3. If this happens, this card gets LIFE +1. A random Darklore Follower on your Field gets STA +2.
skill_text.100030: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by half the difference between its SIZE and DEF (rounding up) and then gets DEF -1.
skill_text.100031: Turn Start: The first Darklore card in your Hand is sent to the Grave. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by half the sent card's SIZE (rounding up).
skill_text.100032: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is even, a random Spell in the enemy Hand is removed from the game. If it is odd, the first Spell in the enemy Grave is removed from the game.
skill_text.100033: Turn Start: If there are at least 2 Followers on your Field, this card gets LIFE -1 and a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/DEF +1/STA +2.
skill_text.100034: Turn Start: 2 random Followers on your Field get STA increased by the difference between their SIZES.
skill_text.100035: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by half the difference between its SIZE and DEF (rounding up).
skill_text.100036: Turn Start: Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 3 of the enemy Field get STA -1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If it is a player and you have 0 Shuffles, you get Shuffles=1.
skill_text.100037: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If it is a player and you have 0 Shuffles, you get Shuffles=1.
skill_text.100038: Turn Start: A random Crux Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If it is a player and you have 0 Shuffles, you get Shuffles=1.
skill_text.100039: Turn Start: If the total SIZE of your Field is greater than the total SIZE of the enemy Field, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If it is a player and you have 0 Shuffles, you get Shuffles=1.
skill_text.100040: Turn Start: The Follower on the enemy Field with the highest DEF gets DEF=0.
skill_text.100041: Turn Start: If there are at least 2 cards in your Hand with the same SIZE, this card gets LIFE increased by half the SIZE of those cards (rounding up).
skill_text.100042: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK increased by the number of Followers in your Hand and STA increased by the number of Followers on your Field.
skill_text.100043: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2. If the Turn Number is even, it gets an additional STA +1.
skill_text.100044: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is a multiple of 3, 2 random Crux Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3. This card gets LIFE +2.
skill_text.100045: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK increased by 1 + the number of empty Slots in your Hand (by a maximum of 4).
skill_text.100046: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field is moved to the next empty Slot on your Field. If there is no empty Slot in a higher Slot Number, it is moved to the first empty Slot on your Field. That Follower gets ATK increased by its new Slot Number and gets STA increased by half as much (rounding down).
skill_text.100047: Turn Start: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK increased by the number of different SIZES of cards in your Hand. If there is only 1 SIZE of cards in your Hand, those Followers get an additional DEF +1/STA +1.
skill_text.100048: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2. If the Turn Number is even, it gets an additional STA +1.
skill_text.100049: Turn Start: 2 random Followers in your Hand get ATK +1/STA +1. 2 random Followers on your Field get STA +1.
skill_text.100050: Turn Start: The Follower in Slot 2 of the enemy Field gets STA -2. The first Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -1. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2.
skill_text.100051: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets the following effects depending on its SIZE. ●3 or more: ATK -2. ●3 or less: STA -3.
skill_text.100052: Turn Start: A random Crux Follower on your Field gets the following effects depending on its SIZE. ●3 or more: ATK +2. ●3 or less: STA +3.
skill_text.100053: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -2. If the number of cards in your Hand is even, it gets an additional DEF -1.
skill_text.100054: Turn Start: The Followers in Slots 2, 3, and 4 of the enemy Field get STA -2. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -1.
skill_text.100055: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1. If that Follower's DEF is at least 1, it gets an additional ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1.
skill_text.100056: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2. If that Followers DEF is 2 or less, it gets an additional DEF +1.
skill_text.100057: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/DEF -1. If that Follower's STA is at least 12, it gets an additional ATK -1/STA -2.
skill_text.100058: Turn Start: If the Turn Number is odd, 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +1. If it is even, a random Follower on your field gets STA +2.
skill_text.100059: Turn Start: The first Vita card in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, the first Follower on the enemy Field with the highest STA gets DEF/STA decreased by half the sent card's SIZE (rounding up, by a maximum of 3).
skill_text.100060: Turn Start: The first Academy Spell in your Hand with a SIZE less than or equal to (9 - the total SIZE of your Field) is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field. If this happens, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by the sent card's SIZE.
skill_text.100061: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2.
skill_text.100062: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field is sent to the top of your Deck. If there are any Followers remaining on your Field, a random Follower on your Field and the sent card both get ATK +2.
skill_text.100063: Turn Start: If there are at least 2 cards in your Hand with the same SIZE, this card gets LIFE increased by half the SIZE of those cards (rounding up, by a maximum of 4). Those cards are sent to the bottom of your Deck.
skill_text.100064: Turn Start: The first card in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by half the sent card's SIZE (rounding down, by a maximum of 4).
skill_text.100065: Turn Start: A random Vita Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1.
skill_text.100066: Turn Start: If the total SIZE of your Field is greater than the total SIZE of the enemy Field, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
skill_text.100067: Turn Start: Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 3 of the enemy Field get STA -1.
skill_text.100068: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1.
skill_text.100069: Turn Start: All cards on your Field with the name "Homunculus Escort" are sent to the Grave. A card with the name "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE=1/ATK=5/DEF=0/STA=5.
skill_text.100070: Turn Start: All cards on your Field with the name "Homunculus Escort" are sent to the Grave. A card with the name "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot of your Field and gets ATK/STA set equal to 10 - the ones digit of the Turn Number.
skill_text.100071: Turn Start: All cards on your Field with the name "Homunculus Escort" are removed from the game. A card with the name "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE=1/ATK=1/DEF=0/STA=9.
skill_text.100072: Turn Start: All cards on your Field with the name "Homunculus Escort" are sent to the Grave. A card with the name "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE=1/ATK=7/DEF=0/STA=2.
skill_text.100073: Turn Start: All cards on your Field with the name "Homunculus Escort" are sent to the Grave. A card with the name "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE=1/ATK=3/DEF=0/STA=3 and gains the skill "▶Attack: The defender gets SIZE +1. This skill is removed.".
skill_text.100074: Turn Start: All cards on your Field with the name "Homunculus Escort" are sent to the Grave. A card with the name "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE=1/ATK=5/DEF=0/STA=5.
skill_text.100075: Turn Start: The following effects are applied depending on the enemy Character's LIFE. ●26 or more: The enemy Character gets LIFE -1, your Character gets LIFE +1. ●15~20: The enemy Character gets LIFE -2. ●9 or less: This card gets LIFE +1.
skill_text.100076: Turn Start: If the Turn Number and the number of cards in your Hand are both odd or both even, a random Follower on your Field with a SIZE of at least 2 gets SIZE -2 (to a minimum of 1).
skill_text.100077: Turn Start: A random Follower in the enemy Hand gets SIZE=1/ATK=5/DEF=0/STA=7.
skill_text.100078: Turn Start: If there are no cards in your Hand and Field that belong to Academy, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +1.
skill_text.100079: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets STA +3. If the Turn Number is even, it gets an additional ATK +2.
skill_text.100081: Turn Start: A random Academy Follower on your Field gets SIZE -1/STA +2.
skill_text.100083: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field with a SIZE of 5 or less gets SIZE +1/ATK +2/DEF +1/STA +2.
skill_text.100084: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets DEF/STA decreased by the number of empty Slots in your Hand (by a maximum of 2).
skill_text.100087: Turn Start: A number of Followers in your Hand equal to the SIZE of the first card in your Hand get ATK +1/STA +1.
skill_text.100088: Turn Start: The following effects are applied depending on the enemy Character's LIFE. ●31 or more: The enemy Character gets LIFE -2. ●20~25: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2. ●10~15: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -2. ●6 or less: The enemy Character gets LIFE=1.
skill_text.100090: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -3. If your Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2.
skill_text.100091: Turn Start: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -2. If your Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, that Follower gets ATK -2/STA -3 instead.
skill_text.100092: Turn Start: A random Crux Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2. If your Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, that Follower gets ATK +2/STA +3 instead.
skill_text.100093: Turn Start: If your Character's LIFE is greater than or equal to the enemy Character's LIFE, this card gets LIFE +1. Otherwise, the enemy Character gets LIFE -2.
skill_text.100094: Turn Start: The following effects are applied depending on the number of cards in your Hand. ●1: You get Shuffles +1. ●2: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +3/STA +3. ●3: A random Follower on your Field gets DEF +1/STA +1. ●4: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +1/STA +1. ●5: This card gets LIFE -1.
skill_text.100095: Turn Start: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2 and gets its skills removed. If any skills were removed, that card gets SIZE -1.

skill_text.1907: ▶Defend: This card gets ATK/STA increased by the tens digit of the number of cards in your Grave.
skill_text.1908: ▶Defend: If this card's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to the attacker's ATK, a random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, this card gets SIZE=1/STA +3 and is sent to the last empty Slot on the enemy Field, then this skill is removed.
skill_text.1909: ▶Attack: A random Follower in your Hand gets ATK=0 and gains the skill "▶Attack: This card gets ATK set equal to 3 + this card's original ATK. This skill is removed.". If the change in ATK was at least 6, this card gets ATK +2/STA +2.
skill_text.1910: ▶Defend: This card gets ATK/STA increased by half the Turn Number (rounding down). This skill is changed to "▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored."
skill_text.1911: ▶Attack: 2 random Empire Followers in your Deck/Hand get ATK/STA increased by half this card's Upgrade Level (rounding up). This skill is removed.
skill_text.1912: ▶Defend: 2 random Empire Followers in your Deck/Hand get DEF increased by half this card's Upgrade Level (rounding up). This skill is removed.
skill_text.1913: ▶Attack: This card gets ATK set equal to 3 + this card's original ATK. This skill is removed.
skill_text.1914: ▶Turn Start: All cards in your Deck with the same name as this card are removed from the game. For every card removed, this card gets ATK +2/STA +2. This card's original skills are restored.
skill_text.1915: ▶Attack: A copy of this card is created at the bottom of your Deck. This skill is removed.
skill_text.1916: ▶Defend: A copy of this card is created at the bottom of your Deck. This skill is removed.
skill_text.1917: ▶Turn Start: 5 random Vita Followers in your Deck whose ATK is lower than this card's ATK get ATK set equal to this card's ATK.
skill_text.1918: ▶Attack: This card gets SIZE +1 (to a maximum of 5) and ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +2.
skill_text.1919: ▶Defend: This card gets STA increased by half its SIZE (rounding up).
skill_text.1920: ▶Attack: This card gets SIZE -1 (to a minimum of 2). The defender gets ATK -1/STA -1.
skill_text.1921: ▶Defend: This card gets STA increased by the difference between its current SIZE and original SIZE.
skill_text.1922: ▶Turn Start: The first card in the enemy Hand is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
skill_text.1923: ▶Defend: This card gets STA increased by the number of empty Slots in the enemy Hand.
skill_text.1924: ▶Attack: The first card in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck. This card gets ATK increased by the number of empty Slots in your Hand.
skill_text.1925: ▶Attack: This card and another random Follower on your Field gain 1 one of the following skills randomly. "▶Attack: This card gets ATK +2." "▶Attack: This card gets ATK +1/STA +2." "▶Defend: This card gets STA +3." This skill is changed to "▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored."
skill_text.1926: ▶Turn Start: A random Darklore Follower in your Deck gets ATK/STA increased by the number of cards in your Grave with the name "Zombie" (by a maximum of 3).
skill_text.1927: ▶Attack: A card in your Deck with the name "Zombie" is sent to the Grave. If this happens, this card gets SIZE -1/ATK +2/STA +2
skill_text.1928: ▶Defend: If the attacker's ATK is less than or equal to this card's total DEF+STA, a card with the name "Zombie" is created at the bottom of your Deck.
skill_text.1929: ▶Turn Start: If you have a Darklore Character, this card gets SIZE and ATK changed to their original values.
skill_text.1930: ▶Attack: The defender gets STA decreased by this card's ATK. This card gets ATK=0 and SIZE +1.
skill_text.1931: ▶Defend: If this card's ATK is 0, this card gets ATK set equal to this card's SIZE.
skill_text.1932: ▶Attack: The last Follower in your Deck is sent to the top of your Deck. This card and the sent card get ATK/STA increased by half this card's Upgrade Level (rounding up). This skill is removed.
skill_text.1933: ▶Defend: A number of random cards in your Grave equal to this card's Upgrade Level are sent to the bottom of your Deck. The first Spell in your Deck gets SIZE decreased by the number of cards sent. This skill is removed.
skill_text.1935: ▶Defend: This card is moved to a random empty Slot on either Field. This skill is removed.
skill_text.1936: ▶Defend: This card gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by the difference between the total SIZE of your Field and the total SIZE of the enemy Field (by a maximum of 5). This skill is changed to "▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored."
skill_text.1937: ▶Turn Start: This card swaps places with the card in your Deck with the highest SIZE. The swapped card gets SIZE cut in half (rounding down).
skill_text.200001: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -4. If your Character has "Sita" in the name, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2. If the number of cards on your Field is less than or equal to the number of cards on the enemy Field, the previous effects become STA -5 and STA -3 respectively.
skill_text.200002: 2 random Vita Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2.
skill_text.200003: If there are any Followers on your Field with "Cook Club" in the name, 2 random Vita Followers on your Field get SIZE +1/ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +2. If both of those Followers have "Cook Club" in the name, they get an additional ATK +1/STA +1.
skill_text.200004: If there is a Vita Follower in Slot 3 of your Field and a card in Slot 3 of the enemy Field, the Vita Follower in Slot 3 of your Field gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by the difference in SIZES of that Follower and the card in Slot 3 of the enemy Field.
skill_text.200005: Your Character gets LIFE increased by 8 - the total SIZE of your Field (by a maximum of 5).
skill_text.200006: The Follower on the enemy Field with the highest SIZE gets SIZE/ATK/DEF/STA cut in half (rounding down).
skill_text.200007: If the difference between your Character's LIFE and the enemy Character's LIFE is 20 or less, both Characters get LIFE changed to equal the average of the two (rounding up). If this happens, starting from Slot 1, cards are sent to the Grave from the Field that has the most cards until there are an equal number of cards in both Fields. If you have a Vita Character, all Followers in your Hand are sent to the Grave. Otherwise, all cards in your Hand are sent to the Grave.
skill_text.200008: The Vita Follower on your Field with the highest SIZE gets SIZE -2/STA +2.
skill_text.200009: 2 random Followers on your Field get STA increased by 1 + the number of different SIZES of cards in your Hand.
skill_text.200010: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK/DEF/STA decreased by the number of Vita Followers in your Hand.
skill_text.200011: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the number of Followers on your Field with "Maid" in the name. If the amount decreased was 2, they get an additional DEF -1.
skill_text.200012: 2 random Academy Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2.
skill_text.200013: If there are any Followers on your Field with "Maid" in the name, all Followers on your Field get SIZE=1 and a random Follower on your Field gets SIZE increased by the total amount of SIZE decreased. That Follower gets STA increased by half the amount of SIZE increased (rounding down). If that card has "Maid" in the name, it gets ATK increased by the same amount.
skill_text.200014: The Academy Follower on your Field with the highest SIZE is sent to the grave. Your Character gets LIFe increased by twice the sent Follower's SIZE (by a maximum of 9).
skill_text.200015: The first Academy Follower on your Field gets DEF set equal to the number of Academy cards in your Hand and ATK/STA increased by half the change in DEF (rounding up).
skill_text.200016: 3 random Followers on the enemy Field get SIZE +1.
skill_text.200017: If you have an Academy Character, 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2/STA -2.
skill_text.200018: The first Follower on the enemy Field and the Follower in Slot 3 of your Field get their SIZE/ATK/DEF/STA swapped.
skill_text.200019: All cards on the enemy Field with a SIZE of 3 or less and all non-Academy cards on your Field are sent to the Grave.
skill_text.200020: The SIZES of the cards in Slot 3 of your Field and Slot 3 of the enemy Field are compared. The card with the lower SIZE is destroyed. If both cards have the same SIZE, the card in Slot 3 of the enemy Field is sent to the Grave.
skill_text.200021: All Crux Followers on your Field get STA +3. If your Character has "Luthica" in the name, those Followers get an additional ATK +3.
skill_text.200022: 2 random Crux Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2.
skill_text.200023: The first Follower on your Field gets ATK +3 and is deactivated. If this happens, the Follower on the enemy Field with the highest SIZE is deactivated.
skill_text.200024: Your Character gets LIFE increased by the number of cards in your Hand.
skill_text.200025: The first Follower on your Field is sent to the enemy Field and deactivated. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by half the sent card's SIZE (rounding up), then that Follower gets SIZE=1.
skill_text.200026: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK increased by the number of cards on your Field minus 1 and gets STA increased by the number of cards on your Field plus 1.
skill_text.200027: If there are an equal number of cards on your Field and the enemy Field, 2 random cards on the enemy Field are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
skill_text.200028: The Follower on the enemy Field with the highest DEF greater than 0 gets DEF decreased by twice its own DEF.
skill_text.200029: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the number of Followers in your Grave with "Knight" in the name. All cards in your Grave are removed from the game.
skill_text.200030: All Followers on your Field and all cards on the enemy Field are deactivated. All Crux Followers on your Field get SIZE -1/ATK +2/STA +2.
skill_text.200031: 2 random Darklore Followers on your Field get STA +3. 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +1.
skill_text.200032: 2 random Darklore Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2.
skill_text.200033: All Followers on your Field get SIZE=1/ATK=1/STA=1, then the Darklore Follower on your Field with the lowest SIZE gets SIZE/ATK/STA increased by the total SIZE/ATK/STA reductions respectively.
skill_text.200034: The first Darklore Follower on your Field gets STA=1. Your Character gets LIFE increased by the amount of STA decreased (by a maximum of 10). That Follower gets ATK increased by half the amount of LIFE increased (rounding down, by a maximum of 3).
skill_text.200035: Your Character gets LIFE -1 and the enemy Character gets LIFE -4.
skill_text.200036: All Followers on your Field with "Crescent", "Scardel", or "Flina" in the name get ATK +3.
skill_text.200037: The Darklore Follower in Slot 3 of your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the total DEF of all Followers on your Field (by a maximum of 5).
skill_text.200038: Any Followers on the enemy Field with a total DEF+STA greater than the enemy Character's LIFE get DEF decreased by half the enemy Character's LIFE (rounding down).
skill_text.200039: If you have a Darklore Character, the Follower on the enemy Field with the highest STA is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. Your Character gets LIFE decreased by half the sent card's SIZE (rounding up).
skill_text.200040: If you have a Darklore Character, all Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2. If you do not have a Darklore Character, all Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2/DEF -2. If there are 2 or fewer Followers on the enemy Field, those Followers get ATK -1/DEF -1.
skill_text.200041: If there are any Followers on your Field with "Student Council" in the name, 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get the following effects depending on the number of Vita Followers on your Field. ●1: ATK -2, ●2: STA -3, ●3 or more: ATK -2/DEF -1/STA -2.
skill_text.200042: The first active Follower on your Field with "Student Council" in the name is deactivated. If this happens, the Follower on the enemy Field with the highest SIZE gets STA decreased by 1 + the ATK of the deactivated Follower.
skill_text.200043: If your Field contains at least as many Followers with "Library Club" in the name as the enemy Field has Spells, then one random Spell on the enemy Field is moved to the first empty Slot on your Field.
skill_text.200044: The first Spell in the enemy Hand with a SIZE of 3 or less gets its SIZE increased by the number of Vita Followers on your Field.
skill_text.200045: The Follower in Slot 2 of your Field gets ATK +2/STA +5. If you do not have a Vita Character, then that Follower loses its skills.
skill_text.200046: If your Character has "Sita" in the name, it gets LIFE +4.
skill_text.200047: A random Follower on the enemy Field with a SIZE less than or equal to the number of cards in your Hand (or Hand plus 1 if you have a Vita Character) is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field, and then gets SIZE -1 (to a minimum of 1).
skill_text.200048: The first Academy Follower on your Field with the lowest STA is sent to the Grave. The first Follower on the enemy Field whose ATK is greater than the sent card's STA gets ATK decreased by the sent card's STA.
skill_text.200049: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get STA -4 or STA -2 (50% chance).
skill_text.200050: All Academy Followers on your Field with a Slot Number equal to their SIZE get ATK +3/STA +3.
