skill_text.200051: The first Academy card in your Hand is sent to the Grave. If this happens, 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -1/DEF -2.
skill_text.200052: The second Academy Follower on your Field gets DEF/STA set equal to the DEF/STA of the Follower in Slot 1 of your Field.
skill_text.200053: All Followers on the enemy Field with the highest SIZE get ATK/DEF/STA decreased by their Slot Number.
skill_text.200054: If you have an Academy Character, the card on the enemy Field with the higher SIZE in Slots 2 and 4 is destroyed and the card with the lower SIZE is sent to the Grave. If you do not have an Academy Character, the card on the enemy Field with the higher SIZE in Slots 2 and 4 is sent to the Grave and the card with the lower SIZE is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. (An empty Slot is considered to have a SIZE of 0. No effect if both Slots contain cards with the same SIZE.)
skill_text.200055: If there are any Followers on your Field and the total SIZE of the enemy Field is odd, a random Follower on the enemy Field is destroyed. If the total SIZE of the enemy Field is even, a random Follower on your Field is sent to the Grave.
skill_text.200056: A random Follower on the enemy Field that does not belong to the enemy Character's faction is moved to the first empty Slot on your Field and deactivated.
skill_text.200057: All Followers on your Field with "Seeker" in the name get ATK +2/STA +1.
skill_text.200058: Your Character gets LIFE decreased by half the number of cards in your Hand (rounding down). If this happens, a random Crux Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand.
skill_text.200059: All Followers on your Field are sent to the Grave. A Crux Follower in your Hand with a SIZE less than or equal to 2 + the number of sent cards is sent to Slot 4 on your Field. That Follower gets ATK/STA increased by half the number of Crux cards in your Grave (rounding up).
skill_text.200060: If the total SIZE of the cards in Slots 1 and 2 of the enemy Field is at least 6, the card in Slot 2 of the enemy Field is destroyed.
skill_text.200061: Up to 4 cards in your Grave are removed from the game. If this happens, 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by 2 + the number of removed cards. Crux Followers get ATK/STA increased by twice the number of removed cards instead.
skill_text.200062: The first Spell in your Hand and the first Spell in the enemy Hand swap places.
skill_text.200063: If there are at least 2 cards in your Hand and the enemy Hand, the first 2 cards in your Hand and the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave.
skill_text.200064: All Followers on your Field with "Witch" in the name get ATK +1/STA +3. Your Character gets LIFE -1.
skill_text.200065: The first Follower on your Field with "Witch" in the name with the lowest SIZE gets ATK=1/STA=1. The first Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by half the total decrease in ATK and STA (rounding up).
skill_text.200066: All Followers on the enemy Field with a SIZE lower than the SIZE of the Darklore Follower on your Field with the highest SIZE get DEF -2/STA -2.
skill_text.200067: 2 random Darklore Followers on your Field get STA increased by half the total SIZE of the cards in your Hand (rounding up).
skill_text.200068: All cards on your Field and the enemy Field with a SIZE less than or equal to the number of cards in your Hand+Field are sent to their owner's Grave. Your Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of sent cards on the enemy Field.
skill_text.200072: If there are at least 6 cards in your Grave, all cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If at least three cards were sent, including at least one Follower, a random card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck, and then this card is removed from the game.
skill_text.200073: All Vita Followers on your Field get STA +3. If there are 10 or fewer cards in your Deck, Vita Followers on your Field get an additional STA +2.
skill_text.200074: If there are Vita Followers on your Field with "Student Council" in the name and Vita Followers on your Field without "Student Council" in the name, 2 random Vita Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3.
skill_text.200075: A random Follower on the enemy Field with skills has its skills removed.
skill_text.200076: The first three cards in your Deck are sent to the Grave. For every Vita Follower that was sent, your Character gets LIFE +3. This Spell is removed from the game.
skill_text.200077: If your Grave contains at least 1 Vita and 1 non-Vita Follower, then all Spells on the enemy Field are sent to the Grave. If there are no Spells on the enemy Field, then this Spell is not sent to the Grave and is instead deactivated.
skill_text.200078: The first Vita Follower in your Hand is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. That Follower gets SIZE=1~2 and ATK +3~5/STA +3~5 (random).
skill_text.200079: Two random Academy Followers on your Field get ATK +4/STA -1.
skill_text.200080: Two random Followers on the enemy Field get DEF decreased by the number of Spells in the enemy Hand.
skill_text.200081: Two random Followers on your Field get STA increased by their SIZE.
skill_text.200082: If there are Academy Followers on your Field with "Maid" in the name and Academy Followers on your Field without "Maid" in the name, 2 random Academy Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3.
skill_text.200083: If there are any Spells on the enemy Field, the first Academy Follower in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random Spell on the enemy Field is sent to the Grave.
skill_text.200084: If your Field contains at least one Follower, a random Follower on the enemy Field is sent to the Grave. If this happens, if this card's SIZE is at least 2, this card gets SIZE=1 and is sent to the top of the enemy Deck. Otherwise, this card is removed from the game.
skill_text.200085: All Academy cards in your Hand get SIZE -1 and are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If at least 2 cards were sent, all cards on the enemy Field are deactivated. The first Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand.
skill_text.200086: A random Crux Follower on your Field gets ATK +1~3 and SIZE -1~3 (random).
skill_text.200087: If there are Crux Followers on your Field with "Seeker" in the name and Crux Followers on your Field without "Seeker" in the name, 2 random Crux Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3.
skill_text.200088: If there are at least six Crux cards in your Grave, a random Follower on your Field gets STA +6.
skill_text.200089: A random Follower on the enemy Field with a SIZE less than the first Follower on your Field's SIZE is deactivated and sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. That Follower gets the skill "▶Turn Start: This card is moved to the first empty Slot on the enemy Field. This skill is removed.".
skill_text.200090: If there is one Follower on your Field, that Follower gets ATK =0/DEF =0, and then 2 Followers on the enemy Field get ATK decreased by half of the total ATK/DEF reduction (rounding down).
skill_text.200091: All cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If at least 2 cards were sent, a random Follower on the enemy Field with a SIZE of at least 4 is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
skill_text.200092: The following effects are applied depending on the number of cards in your Deck. ●10 or more: 2 random Followers on your Field get DEF +2/STA +2. If those Followers belong to Crux, they get an additional ATK +2. ●Less than 10: 2 random Followers on your Field get SIZE +1 and ATK +6/STA +6.
skill_text.200093: A Follower in Slot 3 of the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by its SIZE.
skill_text.200094: If there are Darklore Followers on your Field with "Witch" in the name and Darklore Followers on your Field without "Witch" in the name, 2 random Darklore Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3.
skill_text.200095: If there are at least 7 Darklore Followers in your Grave, all Followers on the enemy Field get DEF -2/STA -2.
skill_text.200096: 6 Spells in your Grave are removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets SIZE +3.
skill_text.200097: The bottom 3 cards in your Deck are sent to the Grave. The following effect is applied a number of times equal to the number of sent Darklore Followers: "A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1."
skill_text.200098: If you have a Darklore Character, your Character gets LIFE -1 and a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -5. If your Grave contains at least 8 cards, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -5. 2 random Spells in your Grave are removed from the game.
skill_text.200099: All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the total number of Spells in your Hand and the enemy Hand. If you have a Darklore Character, the first Spell in your Hand, the enemy Hand, and all Spells on the enemy Field are all sent to the Grave.
skill_text.200100: 2 random Vita Followers on your Field get ATK increased by twice their DEF and STA decreased by half of their DEF (rounding down).
skill_text.200101: The first Follower on your Field with "Student Council Maron" or "Seeker Smartyrain" in the name is sent to your Grave, and then a corresponding card in your Deck with "Dress Up Maron" or "Dress Up Smartylane" in the name is sent to your first empty Slot. That Follower gets SIZE =5/ATK +2/STA +4.
skill_text.200102: The first Vita Follower on your Field is moved to Slot 5 in your Field and gets ATK/STA increased by the total SIZE of cards in Slots 2 and 4 in your Field (by a maximum of 8).
skill_text.200103: The first card on the enemy Field with a SIZE equal to the sum of this card's SIZE and the number of empty Slots in your Hand is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
skill_text.200104: 2 random Academy Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by their difference in SIZE (by a maximum of 4).
skill_text.200105: If there are any Followers on your Field, the first card in your Hand is sent to the Grave, and then for each remaining card in your Hand, a random card in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK decreased by the number of cards in your Hand, and then this card is removed from the game.
skill_text.200106: The first Crux card in your Hand is sent to your Grave. If this happens, a random Crux Follower on your Field gets ATK +4/STA +4.
skill_text.200107: If you have a Crux Character, a random Spell on the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If this happens, the first Follower in your Hand gets ATK/STA increased by the sent card's SIZE.
skill_text.200108: If the first two cards in your Deck belong to the same faction as your Character, they are placed in the first empty Slots of your Field (each card is checked separately). If they do not belong to the same faction as your Character, they are sent to the Grave. The sent cards get SIZE set equal to this card's SIZE. This card is removed from the game.
skill_text.200109: 2 random Darklore cards in your Hand are sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK increased by the difference between its ATK and STA.
skill_text.200110: The first Darklore Follower in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, all Followers on your Field with "Scardel," "Crescent," or "Flina" in the name get SIZE=1. If this happens, a copy of the removed Follower is created in the first empty Slot of your Field. That Follower gets SIZE, ATK, and STA increased by the total SIZE reduction of the other followers.
skill_text.200111: If you have a Darklore Character, the first Follower on the enemy Field with the highest total ATK/STA gets SIZE/ATK/STA decreased by the total number of cards in both Hands (to a minimum SIZE of 1).
skill_text.200112: The first card on your Field other than this one is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Hand. If this happens, the first card on the enemy Field is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand.
skill_text.200113: All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -1. A random Vita Follower on your Field gets STA increased by the total amount of ATK decreased.
skill_text.200114: The first Vita Follower on your Field with the lowest SIZE gets ATK/DEF/STA swapped with the ATK/DEF/STA of the first Follower on the enemy Field with an equal SIZE.
skill_text.200115: The first skill of the first Follower on the enemy Field with a skill is added to the first Follower on your Field that does not have a skill.
skill_text.200116: 2 random Followers on your Field get DEF=0 and get STA increased by twice their changes in DEF.
skill_text.200117: If you have a Vita Character and there are any Followers on your Field, a random Follower on the enemy Field is sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random Spell on the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
skill_text.200118: All Followers on your Field get the following effects for each Follower satisfying each condition. ●"Cook Club": SIZE -1/STA +2. ●"Library Club": ATK +1/STA +1. ●"Student Council": DEF +1/STA +1. ●Vita Followers not belonging to the previous groups: ATK +1/DEF +1.
skill_text.200119: The first Follower on your Field with "Maid" in the name gets ATK +2/STA +2 and is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, the first Academy Follower in your Hand is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and gets ATK +2/STA +2.
skill_text.200120: If there are any Followers on your Field with "Dress Up" in the name, a random card on the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
skill_text.200121: All Academy Followers in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. For each sent Follower, a Spell in the enemy Hand gets SIZE +1 and is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
skill_text.200122: If you have an Academy Character, a random Follower on the enemy Field with a SIZE of 4 or less gets SIZE +2. If the Follower's new SIZE is at least 5, it gets STA -3.
skill_text.200123: All Followers on the enemy Field get STA decreased by the number of Followers in both Fields, and all Followers on your Field get STA decreased by the number of Followers on the enemy Field.
skill_text.200124: If you have an Academy Character, the first Follower on the enemy Field with the highest SIZE other than 1 gets SIZE =1, and then 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by that Follower's former SIZE.
skill_text.200125: If you have an Academy Character, the first Academy Follower on your Field is sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK =1/STA =1. Next, if your Character has "Cinia" in the name, a random Follower on the enemy Field that has a STA of at least 2 and possesses a skill gets ATK =1/STA =1.
skill_text.200126: Crux Followers in your Hand are sent to the Grave. If this happens, the last Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by twice the number of sent cards.
skill_text.200127: The last two Crux cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, two random Followers on the enemy Field are deactivated. If there are any cards on your Field with "Knight" or "Blue Cross" in the name, the deactivated Followers also get STA -2.
skill_text.200128: Followers on your Field with a SIZE greater than or equal to the SIZE of the Follower on the enemy Field with the lowest SIZE get ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
skill_text.200129: 2 random non-Crux Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2/STA -2. Cards are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until there are at least 4 cards in your Hand.
skill_text.200130: If there are any Followers on your Field, all cards in your Hand are sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE increased by 1.5 times the number of sent cards (rounding down).
skill_text.200131: Cards in both Hands that do not belong to the corresponding Character's faction are sent to the Grave.
skill_text.200132: If you have a Crux Character, cards in your Hand are sent to empty Slots in your Field in sequential order until your Field is full or your Hand runs out of cards. If this happens, those cards get SIZE=2~3 (at random). Any sent Spells are deactivated.
skill_text.200133: All cards in your Hand are sent to the Grave. If this happens, all Followers on the enemy Field with the highest total ATK/STA gets ATK/STA decreased by 1.5 times the number of cards sent (rounding up).
skill_text.200134: A random active Darklore Follower on your Field is deactivated and gets ATK +3/STA +1. If the Follower has "GS" in the name, it gets an additional STA +2.
skill_text.200135: All Followers on the enemy Field get STA decreased by the Turn Number divided by the number of cards on the enemy Field (rounding down).
skill_text.200136: If there are any Followers on your Field and any cards with a SIZE of 3 in your Hand, the first card on the enemy Field with a SIZE of 3 is sent to the Grave.
skill_text.200137: If there are any Followers on your Field with "Dress Up" in the name, the first card in your Deck with "Dress Up" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =5/ATK +3/STA +3.
skill_text.200138: If there are any Followers on your Field and there are any Spells on the enemy Field, all Spells on the enemy Field are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If there are no Spells on the enemy Field, all Spells on your Field except this one are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If any Spells were sent, your Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of Spells sent.
skill_text.200139: If you have a Darklore Character, cards on the enemy Field with a SIZE of 3~5, as well as non-Darklore Followers on your Field, are sent to the owners' Graves.
skill_text.200140: If your Field/Hand contain cards with "Lucca," "Milka," and "Serie" in the names (at least 1 of each), those cards get ATK +3/STA +3.
skill_text.200141: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by its SIZE and DEF -1.
skill_text.200142: If you have at least 2 Followers on the Field with the same name, those Followers all get ATK +3/STA +3.
skill_text.200143: If you have at least 2 Followers on the Field with "Tennis Club" in the name, the enemy Character gets LIFE -3.
skill_text.200144: If there are any Followers on your Field, Followers on your Field that belong to the same faction as the first Follower on your Field are sent to the Grave. If this happens, Followers on the enemy Field that belong to the faction of the first Follower on the enemy Field, except for the first Follower on the enemy Field, are sent to the Grave. This card is removed from the game.
skill_text.200145: The first Follower on your Field with a skill and the first Follower on the enemy Field with a skill have their SIZE, ATK/DEF/STA, and skills swapped.
skill_text.200146: If your Character has "Sita" in the name, all cards on the enemy Field are deactivated and all Followers on the enemy Field get DEF decreased by the number of cards on the enemy Field. If your Character does not have "Sita" in the name, 2 random cards on the enemy Field are deactivated and all Followers on the enemy Field get STA decreased by the number of cards deactivated.
skill_text.200147: All Followers in your Hand get ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the number of cards in your Hand and Grave with the same name as this Spell.
skill_text.200148: All cards in your Hand and Grave with the name "Home Study" are removed from the game. 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get STA decreased by twice the number of removed cards.
skill_text.200149: A random Academy Follower on your Field gets DEF increased by the number of Followers on the enemy Field with skills (by a maximum of 3).
skill_text.200150: The first Follower on your Field with "Maid" in the name is deactivated. The first Follower on your Field with "Lady" in the name gets ATK/STA increased by the deactivated Follower's SIZE.
skill_text.200151: The first Follower on your Field is deactivated. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE +3.
skill_text.200152: The first Follower on your Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If this happens, the first Follower on the enemy Field with the highest SIZE and a different faction than the sent Follower is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
skill_text.200153: If you have an Academy Character, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by 8 minus this card's SIZE and gets deactivated. If this card has a SIZE of less than 3, it gets SIZE +1 and is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand. If this card has a SIZE of at least 3, it is removed from the game.
skill_text.200154: If there are at least 2 Crux Followers on your Field, the first Follower on your Field gets STA +6.
skill_text.200155: All cards in your Hand and the enemy Hand are sent to the bottom of the owners' Decks. Your Character gets LIFE increased by the difference in the number of sent cards between you and the enemy minus 1.
skill_text.200156: All Followers on your Field with a SIZE equal to the number of Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3.
skill_text.200157: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK increased the amount of LIFE by which the enemy Character exceeds your Character (by a maximum of 9).
skill_text.200158: 2 random Followers on your Field without skills get ATK +3/STA +3.
skill_text.200159: If you have a Follower on the Field, 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get DEF decreased by 4 minus this card's SIZE. If this card's SIZE is 1, this card is removed from the game. If this card's SIZE is not 1, it gets SIZE -1 and is deactivated.
skill_text.200160: If you have a Crux Character, there are Followers on your Field, and the Turn Number is odd, cards on the enemy Field with a SIZE and Slot number that are both odd or both even are sent to the Grave. If the Turn Number is even, then cards on the enemy Field with a SIZE and Slot number that are not both odd or both even are sent to the Grave. Your Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of cards sent.
skill_text.200161: If your Field contains a Follower, the first Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by the ones digit of the difference between the number of cards in your Deck and the enemy Deck.
skill_text.200162: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by half the ones digit of the Turn Number (rounding down).
skill_text.200163: The card on the enemy Field with a Slot number equal to the first Follower on your Field's SIZE is sent to the Grave, and the first Follower on your Field is sent to the Grave.
skill_text.200164: 2 random Followers on your Field get STA +3. If this happens, cards are sent from the top of the enemy Deck to the enemy Hand until the enemy Hand is full.
skill_text.200165: All Followers on your Field get the following effects depending on the type of the first card in the enemy Hand. ●Spell: DEF -1/STA +5. ●Follower: ATK +3/DEF -1.
skill_text.200166: The first Follower on the enemy Field whose original SIZE is 5 or less with a total ATK/STA of at least 22 or whose original SIZE is 6 or more with a total ATK/STA of at least 32 gets its ATK/STA changed to the total SIZE of your Field if you don't have a Darklore Character, or half the total SIZE of your Field (rounding down) if you have a Darklore Character.
skill_text.200167: All Followers on the enemy Field with the highest total ATK/STA get their ATK/STA cut in half (rounding up). If your Character has "Iri" in the name, those Followers get an additional ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2.
skill_text.200168: The first Follower on your Field with the highest SIZE gets SIZE=1, gets ATK/STA increased by the decrease in SIZE, and gets DEF increased by half the decrease in SIZE (rounding down). Your Character gets LIFE increased by half the decrease in SIZE (rounding down). You get Shuffles +1.
skill_text.200172: If your Field contains a Follower in the same faction as your Character and a Follower in a different faction, then 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3.
skill_text.200173: If you and the enemy both have at least one card in your Hand, then the first card of each of your Hands swap places.
skill_text.200174: One random Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the number of factions in your Hand.
skill_text.200175: If you and the enemy both have at least one Follower on the Field, then one random Follower on your Field and one random Follower on the enemy Field are sent to the Grave.
skill_text.200176: A random Vita Follower on your Field gets ATK increased by 1 plus the number of cards in your Hand and gets STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand minus 1.
skill_text.200177: If you have a Follower on the Field, then all Followers on your Field and the enemy Field get DEF=0. For every Follower, all Followers get STA decreased by that Follower's change in DEF.
skill_text.200178: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by 2 plus the number of Spells on the enemy Field. If you have a Vita Character, all Spells on the enemy Field are removed from the game.
skill_text.200179: Academy Followers on your Field that have a SIZE of 2 or less get ATK=1/STA=1. The first Academy Follower in your Hand gets ATK increased by half of the total ATK reduction (rounding up) and STA increased by half of the total STA reduction (rounding up).
skill_text.200180: All Spells in your Hand get SIZE -1 (to a minimum of 1).
skill_text.200181: The last Academy card in your Hand is sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -4/STA -4.
skill_text.200182: The last card in your Hand is removed from the game. If this happens, a copy of the first card in the enemy Hand is created in the first empty Slot in your Hand.
skill_text.200183: The first card in your Deck is sent to the Grave, and the second card is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random card on the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
skill_text.200184: 2 random Academy Followers on your Field get ATK increased by the number of cards in your Hand and get STA increased by 1 plus the number of cards in the enemy Hand.
skill_text.200185: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -4/STA -4. If this card's SIZE is 1, it is removed from the game. Otherwise, this card gets SIZE=1 and is deactivated.
skill_text.200186: A Follower on your Field with the highest SIZE gets SIZE decreased by the difference between its SIZE and the SIZE of the first card in your Hand.
skill_text.200187: If your Hand contains 3 or fewer cards, Followers are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until there are 4 cards in your Hand.
skill_text.200188: If there are at least 3 cards in your Field with the same SIZE, Followers in your Field with that SIZE get ATK +3/STA +3.
skill_text.200189: The first Crux Follower on your Field with the highest STA gets STA halved (rounding up) and gets DEF increased by half of the STA reduction (rounding up).
skill_text.200190: The number of cards in your Hand and the number of empty Slots in your Hand are compared. 2 random Crux Followers on your Field get ATK increased by the larger number and get STA increased by the smaller number - 1 (by a minimum of 0).
skill_text.200191: 2 random Followers on your Field get SIZE -1/ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
skill_text.200192: All Followers on your Field get STA +5. If you have a Crux Character, all Followers on your Field get an additional ATK +2. All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2.
skill_text.200193: All Followers on the enemy Field with the same SIZE as the first card on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the number of cards on the enemy Field with the same SIZE as the first card on the enemy Field.
skill_text.200194: A random Follower on your Field is sent to the Grave. If this happens, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1 and Shuffles -1. Your Character gets LIFE +1.
skill_text.200195: The first Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA changed to equal half of its total ATK/STA (rounding up).
skill_text.200196: All Followers on the enemy Field get STA decreased by 3 times the number of cards in your Grave named "Mischief".
skill_text.200197: The first 2 Followers in your Grave with "GS" in the name are removed from the game. 3 random Followers in your Grave with "GS" in the name are sent to the bottom of your Deck.
skill_text.200198: If this card's SIZE is greater than 3, it gets SIZE=3. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by this card's SIZE. This card gets SIZE -1 and moves to the enemy Field. If this card has a SIZE of 1, this card is removed from the game.
skill_text.200199: If you have a Darklore Character and you have a Darklore Follower on your Field, all Followers on the enemy Field get SIZE=1 and ATK=6/DEF=0/STA=6, then all Followers on your Field get SIZE=1 and ATK=6/STA=6.
skill_text.200201: All Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +3.
skill_text.200202: The first card in the enemy Hand that does not belong to the enemy Character's faction is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand.
skill_text.200203: The Vita Follower on your Field with the highest DEF gets STA increased by twice its DEF. The first Vita card in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
skill_text.200204: 2 random Vita Followers on your Field get the following skill: "▶Defend: This card gets STA increased by the attacker's ATK. This skill is removed."
skill_text.200205: The second Follower on your Field gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by the first Follower on your Field's SIZE. If this happens, and if you have a Vita Character, the first Follower on your Field is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If you do not have a Vita Character, the first Follower on your Field is sent to the Grave.
skill_text.200206: A number of Followers (equal to the number of Followers on your Field) on both players' Fields whose Slot numbers are odd (if the ones digit of the Turn Number is odd) or even (if the ones digit of the Turn Number is even) are sent to the bottom of their owners' Decks.
skill_text.200207: The first Academy card in your Hand with "Maid' in the name is removed from the game. A random Academy Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the removed card's SIZE.
skill_text.200208: If you have an Academy Character, the first Academy Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the number of allied Academy cards and gets SIZE decreased by the number of allied cards with "Lady" in the name.
skill_text.200209: The first card on the enemy Field with a SIZE equal to this card's Slot number plus this card's SIZE is sent to the Grave. If this happens, this card is deactivated.
skill_text.200210: The first Follower on your Field that belongs to your Character's faction gets ATK/DEF/STA doubled. That card gets the following skill: "▶Turn Start: This card's ATK/DEF/STA are changed to their original values. This skill is removed."
skill_text.200211: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -1/STA -3.
skill_text.200212: Crux Followers on your Field with skills have their skills removed. Those Followers get ATK/STA increased by the total number of removed skills.
skill_text.200213: All Spells on the enemy Field with a SIZE equal or less than the SIZE of the first Crux Follower on your Field are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
skill_text.200214: The first Follower on your Field that belongs to your Character's faction gets ATK/STA increased by 2 plus the total SIZE of Followers on your Field except that one (by a maximum of 8).
skill_text.200215: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +4/STA +4. If this card has a SIZE of 1, it is removed from the game. This card gets SIZE=1 and is deactivated.
skill_text.200216: The Follower on the enemy Field that has a Slot Number equal to this card's Slot Number gets DEF =0/STA -2.
skill_text.200217: The first Follower on your Field that does not belong to the first Follower on your Field's faction is deactivated and gets STA +6.
skill_text.200218: A random Darklore Follower on your Field gets DEF +1/STA +4.
skill_text.200219: If there are no Followers on your Field, a new copy of the first Follower on the enemy Field with the highest total ATK/DEF/STA is created in the first empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE/ATK/DEF/STA changed to equal those of the original Follower. The new Follower gets this skill: "▶Turn Start: This card is sent to the Grave."
skill_text.200220: The first Follower on your Field that belongs to your Character's faction gets ATK/DEF/STA changed to equal the highest ATK/DEF/STA values in both Fields.
skill_text.200221: All cards in your Hand get SIZE -1. All cards in the enemy Field get SIZE +1. All cards on your Field and the enemy Field except this one are sent to the bottom of the owner's Deck. All cards in your Hand and the enemy Hand are moved to the bottom of the owner's Deck. The enemy gets Shuffles -1.
skill_text.200223: Your Character gets LIFE +1 and you get Shuffles +1. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If your Grave contains at least 5 cards, a random card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
skill_text.200224: 2 random Followers in your Field get DEF +1. If this happens, two random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -2.
skill_text.200225: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1. That Follower's ATK and a random Follower on the enemy Field's STA are swapped.
skill_text.200226: All Followers on your Field get DEF -3. The first Vita Follower on your Field with the highest SIZE gets DEF increased by 1 plus half the total DEF reduction (rounding up).
skill_text.200227: Any of the first Academy Follower on your Field's ATK/DEF/STA that are lower than their original values are changed to their original values.
skill_text.200228: Your Character gets LIFE decreased by half the SIZE (rounding down) of a random Follower in your Hand. All Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by the amount of lost LIFE.
skill_text.200229: A random Follower on the enemy Field that belongs to the same faction as your Character is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and deactivated.
skill_text.200230: 3 random Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by the difference between 4 and their own SIZE.
skill_text.200231: The first Follower on your Field with the lowest SIZE gets SIZE +2/ATK +2/DEF +2/STA +2.
skill_text.200232: If your Field contains at least one Follower, all non-Crux Followers on both players' Fields get STA -3.
skill_text.200233: The first card in the enemy Grave is removed from the game. If the removed card's SIZE was 3 or less, a Follower called "Zombie" with the skill "▶Turn Start: This card is sent to the Grave." is created in the first empty Slot of your Field. If the removed card's SIZE was 4 or more, a Follower called "Devil Lady" is created in the first empty Slot of your Field.
skill_text.200234: Up to 3 cards in your Grave are removed from the game, starting from the first. 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by the number of removed Darklore Followers.
skill_text.200235: All Darklore Followers in your Grave are removed from the game. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by the number of removed cards.
skill_text.200236: A number of cards equal to the total number of cards on both players' Fields are sent from both players' Hands to the bottom of the owner's Deck. If this happens, a random Follower on your Field gets STA increased by the total number of cards sent.
skill_text.200237: Your Character gets LIFE increased by the number of Neutral cards in your Hand/Field minus 1, and all Followers on your Field gain an equal amount of STA.
skill_text.200238: A random Follower on your Field gets the following effects depending on the factions present in your Hand. Vita: ATK +2. Academy: STA +2. Crux: ATK +1/STA +1. Darklore: SIZE -1. Neutral: ATK +2/STA +2.
skill_text.200239: 2 random Vita Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. Two random Followers on your Field with "Sita" in the name get ATK +1/STA +1.
skill_text.200240: The first two cards in your Deck with "Sita" in the name are sent to the first two empty Slots in your Hand. If this happens, those cards get SIZE -2.
skill_text.200241: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by half the ATK of the first Follower in your Hand (rounding up). If this happens, the first Spell in the enemy Hand without "Halloween" in the name is copied to the first empty Slot in your Field.
skill_text.200242: 2 random Academy Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. Two random Followers on your Field with "Cinia" in the name get ATK +1/STA +1.
skill_text.200243: The first two cards in your Deck with "Cinia" in the name are sent to the first two empty Slots in your Hand. If this happens, the first Follower on the enemy Field with a STA less than or equal to the total SIZE of the sent cards is sent to the Grave.
skill_text.200244: If you have at least one Follower on the Field, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets its first skill changed to one of the following skills randomly. "▶Attack: This card gets ATK -1." "▶Defend: This card gets STA -3." If this happens, the first Spell in the enemy Hand without "Halloween" in the name is copied to the first empty Slot of your Field.
skill_text.200245: 2 random Crux Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. Two random Followers on your Field with "Luthica" in the name get ATK +1/STA +1.
skill_text.200246: Two random Followers on your Field get DEF increased by half of the number of empty Slots in your Hand (rounding up). The first two cards in your Deck with "Luthica" in the name are sent to the first two empty Slots in your Hand.
skill_text.200247: A random Follower on your Field gets one of the following skills randomly. "▶Attack: This card gets ATK +1/STA +1." "▶Defend: This card gets STA +3." "▶Turn Start: This card gets DEF +2." If this happens, the first Spell in the enemy Hand without "Halloween" in the name is copied to the first Slot of your Field.
skill_text.200248: 2 random Darklore Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. Two random Followers on your Field with "Iri" in the name get ATK +1/STA +1.
skill_text.200249: If there are any Followers on your Field, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA decreased by 1 plus the number of empty Slots in your Hand. The first two cards in your Deck with "Iri" in the name are sent to the first two empty Slots in your Hand.
skill_text.200250: The first card in your Hand is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field and has its SIZE halved (rounding down). If this happens, the first Spell in the enemy Hand without "Halloween" in the name is copied to the first empty Slot of your Field.
skill_text.200251: Up to 2 random Followers on your Field with "Student Council" in the name are deactivated. The first Follower on the enemy Field with the highest STA gets STA decreased by the total ATK of the deactivated Followers.
skill_text.200252: The first Follower on your Field with "Maid" in the name and the lowest SIZE is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand. Academy Followers in your Hand and Field get ATK +2/STA +2.
skill_text.200253: All Followers on your Field on your Field with "Seeker" in the name get the following skill: "▶Defend: If there are any Crux cards on your Field other than this one, this card gets STA increased by half the attacker's ATK (rounding up). This skill is removed."
skill_text.200254: All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK decreased by 1 plus the number of Followers on your Field with "Witch" in the name. Followers on your Field with "Witch" in the name get ATK increased by the same amount. (Note: This card isn't considered to have "Witch" in the name for the purposes of other cards' skills because it uses a different word in Korean.)
skill_text.200255: All Followers on your Field get ATK +4/STA +4.
skill_text.200256: For each empty Slot in the enemy Hand, the first Spell in the enemy Deck is sent to the enemy Hand.
skill_text.200257: All Followers on the enemy Field get STA -4.
skill_text.200258: All Followers on the enemy Field get DEF -5.
skill_text.200259: All cards in both Fields get SIZE = 1.
skill_text.200260: All cards on the enemy Field with "Shion" or "Rion" in the name are destroyed.
skill_text.200261: All Followers on the enemy Field get SIZE=1~10 (random).
skill_text.200262: All Followers on the enemy Field get the following skill: "▶Attack: This card gets ATK +1."
skill_text.200263: All Followers on the enemy Field have their skills removed.
skill_text.200264: If there are no empty Slots in the enemy Field, all cards in the enemy Field are sent to the Grave.
skill_text.200265: If you have a Follower on your Field with "Student Council" in the name, the first card in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck. The first card on the enemy Field with the same SIZE as that card is sent to the Grave.
skill_text.200266: All Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by 1 plus half of the Turn Number (rounding down, by a maximum of 5). You get Shuffles +1 and the opponent gets Shuffles -1.
skill_text.200267: 2 random Followers in your Field get ATK +1/STA +1. 2 random Followers in your Field with "Witch" in the name get ATK +2/STA +2.
skill_text.200268: If there are any Followers in your Field with "Lady" in the name, a random Spell in the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If this happens, all Followers in your Field with "Lady" in the name get STA increased by the sent card's SIZE.
skill_text.200269: If you have an Academy Character, all Spells on the enemy Field are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. A number of Spells called "Pleased to meet you" equal to the number of sent Spells are created in the last Slots on the enemy Field and deactivated (at least 1 card is created). This card is removed from the game.
skill_text.200270: 2 random Followers in your Field with "Seeker" in the name get ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the number of skills they have.
skill_text.200271: The first Follower in your Field with the highest STA gets ATK and STA swapped, and then gets STA +2.
skill_text.200272: All Crux Followers on your Field get STA +3. If they have "Seeker" in the name, they get an additional ATK +2. If the Turn Number is even, a random Spell in the enemy Field is deactivated. This card is deactivated.
skill_text.200273: If there are any Followers in your Field, the following effect is applied 3 times: "A random Follower in either Field gets ATK -1/STA -3."
skill_text.200274: The first Follower in your Field and a Follower in Slot 3 in the enemy Field get DEF/STA swapped with each other. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE -1.
skill_text.200275: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get the following effects depending on the number of cards on your Field, then this card is deactivated and remains on the Field. 1: STA -2. 2: ATK -1/STA -1. 3: ATK -1/STA -2. 4: ATK -2/STA -2. 5: ATK -2/STA -3. If the Turn Number is odd, a random Spell on the enemy Field is deactivated.
skill_text.200276: A random Follower in the enemy Hand is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Field. (HINT: There aren't enough.)
skill_text.200277: The Turn Number is increased by 2. All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2/STA -2. (HINT: I'm going to take a break...)
skill_text.200278: The following effect is applied five times: "A random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -5." (HINT: Back away...)
skill_text.200279: All Followers on the enemy Field get the following skill: "▶Attack: This card gets STA=1."
skill_text.200280: All Followers in your Hand with "Library Club" in the name are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, an equal number of random cards in the enemy Field are deactivated.
skill_text.200281: Followers in your Field with an ATK equal to their STA get ATK +4/STA +4.
skill_text.200282: The first Follower in your Grave that belongs to your Character's faction is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field, gets ATK +2/STA +2, and is deactivated. That Follower's skills are changed to "▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored."
skill_text.200283: All Academy Followers on your Field without "Defend" skills get DEF +1/STA +3. The first card in your Deck with "Lady" in your name is moved to the first empty Slot of your Hand.
skill_text.200284: 2 random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/DEF decreased by half of the total SIZE of Followers in your Field with "Witch" in the name (rounding down). (Note: This card isn't considered to have "Witch" in the name for the purposes of other cards' skills because it uses a different word in Korean.)
skill_text.200285: If you have a Follower on your Field and if any of the following conditions are met, 4 random cards on either player's Fields are sent to the Grave and this card is removed from the game. Conditions: "The total number of Followers on your Field and the enemy Field is 4." "The Turn Number is a multiple of 4." "The total number of empty Slots in your Hand and the enemy Hand is 4."
skill_text.200286: If there are Followers in your Field with "Seeker" in the name and this card has a SIZE of 1, all Followers in the enemy Field get STA -4, the enemy player gets Shuffles -1, and a random card in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave. If this card does not have a SIZE of 1, it gets SIZE -1 and is deactivated.
skill_text.200287: Up to 2 random Followers in the enemy Hand swap places with up to 2 random Followers in the enemy Field.
skill_text.200288: If you have a Crux Character, the first 10 cards in the enemy Grave are removed from the game. All Followers in the enemy Field get STA decreased by the number of removed cards divided by 1 plus the number of Followers in the enemy Field (rounding down).
skill_text.200289: If there are at least 3 Followers in the enemy Field with the same SIZE, the first of those Followers is destroyed.
skill_text.200290: If there are at least 3 Followers in your Field, the first Follower in the enemy Field with the highest ATK gets ATK changed to equal its original value.
skill_text.200291: 2 cards named "GS Scout" and "Aletheian B-NA" are created in your Grave, the enemy Grave, and the bottom of your Deck.
skill_text.200292: All Followers in your Field get STA -5.
skill_text.200294: All Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/STA halved (rounding up). (HINT: Critical)
skill_text.200295: All Followers in your Field get DEF doubled. All Followers in the enemy Hand and Field lose all skills.
skill_text.200296: All Followers in your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. All Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -2/STA -2. (HINT: Don't be cheap!)
skill_text.200297: All cards in your Hand and Field are sent to the top of your Deck. All cards in the enemy Field are deactivated. (HINT: Peacefully...)
skill_text.200298: All cards in the enemy Grave are removed from the game.
skill_text.200299: Spells named "Good Job" are created in all empty Slots in both Fields and deactivated. (HINT: Me too!)
skill_text.200300: All Followers on the enemy Field get SIZE decreased by the number of empty Slots on the enemy Field. All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/DEF/STA decreased by their reduction in SIZE.
skill_text.200301: The Follower in your Field with the lowest DEF gets DEF changed to equal the highest DEF in the enemy Field.
skill_text.200302: All Followers on the enemy Field get STA decreased by the total SIZE of your Field divided by the number of cards on your Field (rounding down).
skill_text.200303: The first 5 Vita Followers in your Deck get ATK/STA increased by 5,4,3,2,1 starting from the top. You get Shuffles +1.
skill_text.200304: If there are any Spells in the enemy Field, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets DEF -4.
skill_text.200305: For each Follower in your Field with "Lady" in the name, the first Spell in the enemy Deck is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
skill_text.200306: If you have an Academy Character and your Field SIZE is at least 3, all cards in both Fields are randomly rearranged. The number of movements will not exceed the total number of cards in both Fields.
skill_text.200307: The first card in your Deck with "Sanctuary" in the name is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE increased by half of the sent card's SIZE (rounding up).
skill_text.200308: 2 random Followers in your Field get SIZE decreased by the number of Spells in your Field and get STA increased by the SIZE reduction.
skill_text.200309: If you have a Crux Character, all Spells in both Fields are sent to the owners' Graves. If this happens, the first Spell in your Hand is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. A card with the name "Artificial Sanctuary Experiment" is created in the first empty Slot on the enemy Field and gets SIZE=2.
skill_text.200310: The first Follower on your Field is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, the next Follower on your Field gets ATK +4 and gets STA increased by the sent card's DEF. That Follower also gets SIZE -1 if the sent card has "Aletheian" in the name.
skill_text.200311: The first Follower on your Field with "GS" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot of the enemy Field, gets ATK=0, and gets STA increased by half the ATK reduction (rounding down). Its skills become the following: "▶Defend: All Followers on your Field get DEF -1." "▶Turn Start: This card is sent to the Grave."
skill_text.200312: If you have a Darklore Character, the skills of the second Follower on your Field are copied to the first Follower on your Field. The first Follower on your Field gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by the number of copied skills.
skill_text.200313: All cards on the enemy Field are deactivated. All Spells on the enemy Field get SIZE +1. All Followers on the enemy Field get their skills removed. The enemy player gets Shuffles -1.
skill_text.200314: All Followers on your Field gain the following skill: "▶Attack: If this card's DEF is less than 0, this card's DEF becomes the absolute value of its DEF."
skill_text.200315: All Followers in your Hand get stats changed to equal the stats of the first card in your Field with "Conundrum" in the name. All Followers in the enemy Hand get stats changed to equal the first card in the enemy Field with "Conundrum" in the name.
skill_text.200317: A random high-level card is created in the first empty Slot of your Field. (HINT: A random powerful spell will appear.)
skill_text.200318: A Spell called "Thank You" is created in all empty Slots of the enemy Field and deactivated. (HINT: Thank you.)
skill_text.200319: All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2, then this card is deactivated and remains on the Field. (HINT: Endless decay.)
skill_text.200320: Cards in Slots 1 and 5 in the enemy Field are swapped. Cards in Slots 2 and 4 in the enemy Field are swapped. Followers in Slots 1 and 2 in the enemy Field get STA -2.
skill_text.200321: The first card in the enemy Field with a SIZE equal to the difference between 10 and your Field SIZE gets ATK -2/STA -2 and is sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
skill_text.200322: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If there are any active cards on the enemy Field and no cards on the enemy Field with the name "Going to School", this card remains active on your Field.
skill_text.200323: 2 random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -1/STA -1. If their remaining STA is even, they get an additional ATK -2/STA -2.
skill_text.200324: For each Follower in your Field with "Lady" in the name, a Follower on top of the enemy Deck is sent to the enemy Hand. If at least 3 cards are sent, a random card in the enemy Field is sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
skill_text.200325: All Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the number of empty Slots in your Hand. All cards in both Hands are sent to the bottom of the owners' Decks.
skill_text.200326: If you have a Crux Character and this card's SIZE is 1, this card gets SIZE=2 and is sent to the enemy Field and deactivated. If this card's SIZE is 2, it gets SIZE=1 and is sent to the enemy Field.
skill_text.200327: The first Follower in your Hand is sent to the Grave. The Follower in your Field with the lowest STA gets STA changed equal to the sent Follower's STA.
skill_text.200328: 2 random Crux Followers in your Field get STA increased by the ATK of the first Follower in the enemy Field.
skill_text.200329: All cards in both Fields except for this card and the first Follower in your Field get SIZE -1. The first Follower in your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the total SIZE reduction.
skill_text.200330: If the total SIZE of all Followers in your Field is greater than the total SIZE of all Followers in the enemy Field, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets ATK/DEF/SIZE halved (rounding up).
skill_text.200331: If there are any Spells in the enemy Field, the first Follower in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and gets ATK +4/STA +4. If the sent Follower does not belong to your Character's faction, it gets an additional SIZE -1.
skill_text.200332: All cards in your Hand and Deck with a SIZE of 10 are sent to the bottom of your Deck. For each card sent, a random card in the enemy Field is sent to the top of the enemy Deck and all Followers in your Field get STA +1. All Followers in your Field are deactivated.
skill_text.200333: If the enemy Hand contains a card, the first 2 cards in the enemy Deck get SIZE +1 and are sent to the enemy Hand. (HINT: Even if you offer something, it might not be enough.)
skill_text.200334: All cards on both players' Fields that do not have a SIZE of 1 are deactivated. All Followers on both players' Fields with a SIZE of 5 are destroyed. (HINT: You need to go on a diet... but it's already too late.)
skill_text.200335: All cards without "Knight" in the name get SIZE +3. (HINT: Are you a knight?)
skill_text.200336: The first Spell in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field. If the sent card's SIZE is odd, it is sent to the Grave. The first Spell in the enemy Deck is sent to the first empty Slot of the enemy Field. If the sent card's SIZE is odd, it is sent to the Grave.
skill_text.200337: The first Follower on your Field and a random Follower on the enemy Field with a SIZE less than or equal to twice the SIZE of the first Follower on your Field both have their ATK/STA set equal to half (rounding down) the sum of both Followers' ATK/STA.
skill_text.200338: If you have a Vita Character, all Followers on both Fields with a SIZE less than this card's SIZE are removed from the game. If this card's SIZE is at least 6, this card is removed from the game. Otherwise, this card gets SIZE +2 and is sent to the top of your Deck.
skill_text.200339: All cards on both players' Fields have their SIZE randomly redistributed.
skill_text.200340: 2 random Followers on your Field get STA increased by the number of Spells in the top 5 cards of your Deck and get ATK increased by the number of Followers in the top 5 cards of your Deck.
skill_text.200341: If you have an Academy Character and the number of Spells on the enemy Field is greater than or equal to the number of Followers on the enemy Field, a random Follower on the enemy Field is sent to the Grave. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by twice the sent Follower's SIZE (by a maximum of 10).
skill_text.200342: If your Field contains a Follower, the following effect is applied a number of times equal to the difference in the number of cards on your Field and the enemy Field: "A random Follower on the enemy Field gets SIZE +1/ATK -1."
skill_text.200343: The Follower on your Field with the lowest STA is destroyed. If your Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, a number of random Followers on the enemy Field equal to half the destroyed Follower's SIZE (rounding down) are sent to the Grave.
skill_text.200344: All cards on the enemy Field with an odd SIZE and all non-Crux cards on your Field are sent to the Grave.
skill_text.200345: The first Follower on your Field regains its original skills and gets ATK +1/STA +1.
skill_text.200346: 2 random Darklore Followers on your Field get ATK increased by the total DEF of all Followers on the enemy Field and get STA decreased by half (rounding up) the total DEF of all Followers on the enemy Field minus 1.
skill_text.200347: If you have a Darklore Character, you get Shuffles +5 and one random Follower on your Field gets ATK/DEF/STA decreased by the number of enemy Shuffles, then the enemy gets Shuffles -1. This card is removed from the game.
skill_text.200348: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3.
skill_text.200350: All cards on the enemy Field get SIZE=4. (HINT: Odd? Even!)
skill_text.200351: All Followers on your Field/Hand/Deck get ATK +1/STA +1. Your Character gets LIFE +1. You get Shuffles +1. All Followers on the enemy Field/Hand/Deck get ATK -1/STA -1. This card is removed from the game.
skill_text.200352: All cards in your Grave with the same name as the first card on your Field other than this one are sent to the top of your Deck. This card is removed from the game.
skill_text.200353: 2 random Followers on your Field get SIZE=4. All Followers whose SIZE increased get ATK/DEF/STA increased by their increase in SIZE.
skill_text.200354: All cards on the enemy Field except the first and last cards are sent to the Grave.
skill_text.200355: The first card on the enemy Field with a SIZE of at least 6 is moved to the first empty Slot of your Field and deactivated. This card is removed from the game.
skill_text.200356: The first card on the enemy Field with a total DEF+SIZE of 5 is destroyed, then your Character gets LIFE decreased by half the destroyed card's DEF (rounding up).
skill_text.200357: The first 10 cards of both players' Decks are sent to the Grave. If this happens, 10 random cards with a different name than this card are sent from your Grave to the bottom of your Deck. 10 random cards are sent from the enemy Grave to the bottom of the enemy Deck. This card is removed from the game.
skill_text.200358: If this card's SIZE is greater than 2, it gets SIZE=3. Your Character gets LIFE increased by this card's SIZE. If this card's SIZE is 1, it is sent to the Grave. Otherwise, this card gets SIZE=1 and is deactivated.
skill_text.200359: If all cards in your Hand/Field other than this one belong to your Character's faction, 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/DEF decreased by half the number of cards in your Hand/Field (rounding down).
skill_text.200360: If the enemy Hand contains a Spell, all Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -4/STA -4. Otherwise, all Followers on your Field get ATK -2/STA -2.
skill_text.200361: All Followers on your Field with "GS," "Aletheian," or "Apostle" in the name get ATK +3.
skill_text.200362: All Darklore Followers on your Field are deactivated. A random card on the enemy Field with a SIZE less than or equal to the number of deactivated Followers is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck (if it is a Follower) or sent to the Grave (if it is a Spell).
skill_text.200363: The last Follower in your Deck is sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random Follower on your Field gets SIZE -1/ATK +4/STA +4.
skill_text.200364: The first card in your Hand is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower on the enemy Field is destroyed.
skill_text.200365: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field have their ATK/DEF/STA changed to their original values for any stat greater than its original value.
skill_text.200366: All Followers on the enemy Field with ATK/DEF/STA higher than their original values get ATK/DEF/STA decreased by twice the amount that each stat exceeds its original value.
skill_text.200367: The first Follower in the enemy Hand is changed into "Game Starter".
skill_text.200368: All cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck, then the first 2 Followers and Spells are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand.
skill_text.200369: 2 random Vita Followers on your Field without "Student Council" or "Library Club" in the name get the following effects depending on who wins the coin flip. You win: ATK +3/DEF+1/STA+1. Opponent wins: ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +3.
skill_text.200370: The first 3 cards other than this card on your Field, in your Hand, and in your Deck that belong to your Character's faction and do not have a SIZE of 1 get SIZE -1.
skill_text.200371: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -1/STA -2. If your Field contains a card with a SIZE of at least 6, those Followers instead get ATK -2/STA -4.
skill_text.200372: 2 random Academy Followers on your Field without "Maid" or "Lady" in the name get the following effects depending on who wins the coin flip. You win: ATK +3/DEF+1/STA+1. Opponent wins: ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +3.
skill_text.200373: All Followers on your Field that belong to your Character's faction regain their original skills, and any of their ATK/DEF/STA that are lower than their original values are changed to their original values.
skill_text.200374: 2 random Crux Followers on your Field with at least 1 DEF get DEF decreased by twice their own Def. If this happens, those Followers get ATK increased by twice the decrease in their respective DEF.
skill_text.200375: 2 random Crux Followers on your Field without "Knight" or "Seeker" in the name get the following effects depending on who wins the coin flip. You win: ATK +3/DEF+1/STA+1. Opponent wins: ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +3.
skill_text.200376: A number of Followers on the enemy Field equal to the number of Crux Followers on your Field have their ATK/DEF/STA divided by 1 + the number of Crux Followers on your Field (rounding down).
skill_text.200377: You get Shuffles -1 (minimum 0). If this happens, all Followers in your Hand/Field get ATK +2/STA +2.
skill_text.200378: 2 random Darklore Followers on your Field without "Witch" or "GS" in the name get the following effects depending on who wins the coin flip. You win: ATK +3/DEF+1/STA+1. Opponent wins: ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +3.
skill_text.200379: A card named "Good Job" is created at the top and bottom of the enemy Deck. If you have a Darklore Character, a card named "Good Job" is created in the first empty Slot on the enemy Field, and a card named "Good Job" is created in the next empty Slot on the enemy Field and deactivated.
skill_text.200380: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2.
skill_text.200381: The first Follower in the enemy Hand gets its skills removed, then that Follower and a random Follower on the enemy Field swap skills.
skill_text.200382: All Spells in the enemy Hand/Field are changed to the following cards depending on their factions and get SIZE=2. Vita: "New Student Orientation", Academy: "New Maid Training", Crux: "Close Encounter", Darklore: "Blood Reversal", Neutral: "Blissful Moment".
skill_text.200383: The enemy gets Shuffles -1 and LIFE -1. A random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1. If your Grave contains at least 5 cards, a random card is sent from your Grave to the bottom of your Deck.
skill_text.200384: A random Follower on your Field is moved to this card's Slot and gets ATK/STA increased by its new Slot number.
skill_text.200385: 2 random Vita Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. Another effect is applied to the enemy in dungeons. (Bonus effect: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2/STA -2.)
skill_text.200386: 2 random Followers on your Field gain the following skill: "▶Attack: This card's ATK/DEF are changed to their original values if they are lower than their original values."
skill_text.200387: If you have a Vita Character, all Followers in the enemy Hand, Field, and Deck get ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1. A random Follower on the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. This card is removed from the game.
skill_text.200388: A random card on the enemy Field is deactivated. If you have an Academy Character, a random card on the enemy Field is deactivated.
skill_text.200389: 2 random Academy Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. Another effect is applied to the enemy in dungeons. (Bonus effect: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2/STA -2.)
skill_text.200390: The first 2 cards in the enemy Deck are copied to the first 2 empty Slots in your Hand.
skill_text.200391: If you have an Academy Character, all Spells in the enemy Grave are removed from the game. All Spells and one random Follower on the enemy Field are deactivated. All Spells in the enemy Hand and Deck get SIZE +1. This card is removed from the game.
skill_text.200392: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by 2 plus the number of Spells on the enemy Field.
skill_text.200393: 2 random Crux Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. Another effect is applied to the enemy in dungeons. (Bonus effect: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2/STA -2.)
skill_text.200394: If you have a Crux Character and the Turn Number is even, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +5/STA +5. If the Turn Number is a multiple of 3, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets ATK -5/STA -5.
skill_text.200395: If you have a Crux Character, all Followers on the enemy Field get STA -9. All Followers in the enemy Hand get STA -3. All Followers in the enemy Deck get STA -1. This card is removed from the game.
skill_text.200396: All cards in your Hand/Deck with the same name as the first Follower on your Field are sent to the Grave. The first Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the number of sent cards and gets DEF increased by half (rounding up) the number of sent cards.
skill_text.200397: 2 random Darklore Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. Another effect is applied to the enemy in dungeons. (Bonus effect: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2/STA -2.)
skill_text.200398: All Followers on the enemy Field with at least 2 DEF get DEF decreased by twice their DEF.
skill_text.200399: If you have a Darklore Character, all cards in the enemy Grave are sent to your Grave. The first Followers in your Hand and Deck get STA increased by the tens digit of the number of cards in your Grave and get ATK increased by the ones digit of the number of cards in your Grave. This card is removed from the game.
skill_text.200400: If this card's SIZE is 2 or less, it is removed from the game. If your Character's LIFE is less than or equal to the enemy Character's LIFE, this card gets SIZE -1, swaps places with a random Follower on the enemy Field, and gets deactivated.
skill_text.200401: A Follower called "Library Club Serie" is created in this card's Slot. That Follower has its SIZE set equal to its Slot number and its ATK/STA set equal to twice its new SIZE. This card is removed from the game.
skill_text.200402: The first 2 cards in your Hand get their SIZE changed equal to this card's SIZE. If this card has a SIZE of 2 or less, it is sent to the Grave. Otherwise, this card gets SIZE=1~5 and is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand.
skill_text.200403: If you have a Vita Character, 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -2, and their skills become "▶Turn Start: This card is sent to the Grave."
skill_text.200404: The following effects are applied depending on who wins the coin flip. You win: "The first card in the enemy Hand is removed from the game." Opponent wins: "The first 5 cards in your Grave are removed from the game."
skill_text.200405: 2 random Followers on your Field gain the following skill: "▶Attack: If this card's STA is lower than its original value, this card's STA is changed to its original value. This skill is removed."
skill_text.200406: If you have an Academy Character, the 8th card in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field, then the following effects are applied depending on the sent card's type. Follower: "2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -4/STA -4." Spell: "All Spells on the enemy Field are sent to the Grave."
skill_text.200407: The first Follower on your Field and the last Follower on the enemy Field get their SIZE/ATK/DEF/STA swapped.
skill_text.200408: If your Field contains a Follower with "Blue Cross" in the name, a random Follower on your Field and a random Follower on the enemy Field get STA=1.
skill_text.200409: If you have a Crux Character, a random Follower in the enemy Field/Hand/Deck that belongs to a different faction than the enemy Character gets its skills changed to "▶Defend: This card is moved to the first empty Slot on the enemy Field. This skill is changed to "▶Turn Start: This card's original skills are restored."."
skill_text.200410: All Followers on your Field with "Crescent," "Scardel," or "Flina" in the name get STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand/Field with "Crescent," "Scardel," or "Flina" in the name and gain half as much (rounding up) ATK.
skill_text.200411: If your Field/Grave contains a Follower, 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get STA decreased by the difference between the number of Followers in your Grave and the number of Followers in the enemy Grave (by a maximum of 6).
skill_text.200412: If you have a Darklore Character, all Followers on the enemy Field have their "Attack" and "Turn Start" skills changed to the following skill: "▶Attack: This card gets ATK -1." All Followers in your Hand/Field gain the following skill: "▶Attack: This card gets ATK +1."
skill_text.200413: All Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by 1 plus your Shuffles. You get Shuffles +2. If this card's SIZE is 3 or more, it is removed from the game. Otherwise, this card gets SIZE +1 and is sent to the second Slot in your Deck.
skill_text.200414: 2 Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2.
skill_text.200415: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3. 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -1/STA -1.
skill_text.200416: All active Followers in your Hand/Field with "Library" in the name are sent to the bottom of your Deck. A number of cards with "Library" in the name equal to 1 plus half the number of sent cards (rounding down) are sent from the top of your Deck to the first empty Slots of your Field. Those Followers get ATK/STA increased by half the number of cards (rounding down) that were sent to the bottom of your Deck. (Note: This card isn't considered to have "Library" in the name for the purposes of other cards' abilities because it uses a different word in Korean.)
skill_text.200417: The second Follower on the enemy Field gets its STA set equal to the Slot Number of the last card on the enemy Field and gets ATK increased by half (rounding down) the amount of STA decreased.
skill_text.200418: A random Follower on your Field gets ATK or STA (25%/75% chance) increased by the ones digit of the Turn Number.
skill_text.200419: If you have an Academy Character, all Followers on the enemy Field with the highest SIZE get ATK/STA decreased by the difference between the SIZE of the Follower on your Field with the lowest SIZE and the Follower on the enemy Field with the highest SIZE.

skill_text.200570: All Followers get STA decreased by the number of Followers on your Field with "GS" in the name. All Followers get ATK increased by twice the STA reduction.
skill_text.200571: If you have a Darklore Character and there are any Spells on the enemy Field, all Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -4/STA -4. If there are no Spells on the enemy Field, your Character gets LIFE -1.
skill_text.200572: All cards on your Field get SIZE decreased and DEF increased by half the number of factions present on both Fields (rounding up). All Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by the number of factions present on both Fields. A number of cards equal to twice the number of factions present on both Fields are sent from the top of your Grave to the bottom of your Deck. This card is removed from the game.
skill_text.200573: All Followers get all their skills except their first skills removed. All Followers on your Field get ATK/DEF/STA increased by the number of skills they each lost.
skill_text.200574: All Followers on your Field get ATK +1/STA +1. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by 3 minus the number of Followers on your Field.

skill_text.200576: If there are at least 3 Followers on your Field, 3 random Followers on your Field get ATK changed to half the combined ATK of the Followers out of those 3 with the highest ATK and the lowest ATK (rounding up).

skill_text.200579: If the first card in your Deck is a Follower, it gets SIZE -1/ATK +2/STA +2 and is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand.
skill_text.200580: A random Follower on your Field gets one of the following skills randomly. "▶Attack: This card gets ATK +3." "▶Attack: The defender gets ATK -1/STA -1." "▶Attack: This card gets STA +3."

skill_text.200607: A random Follower on your Field gets its ATK halved (rounding down). If this happens, that card's DEF/STA are set equal to the highest DEF/STA values on both Fields.
