skill_text.200711: All Followers on both Fields whose DEF is less than or equal to the number of Followers on your Field get DEF -3.
skill_text.200712: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by 4 minus the number of skills each Follower possesses respectively.
skill_text.200713: The Follower on your Field with the highest SIZE gets SIZE +3. If that Follower belongs to Crux, that Follower gets ATK/STA increased by half its new SIZE (rounding down). If that Follower's new SIZE is at least 9, it gets SIZE=3.
skill_text.200714: This card has a 50% chance to be sent to the first empty Slot on the enemy Field and remain active.
skill_text.200715: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets SIZE increased by half that Follower's SIZE (rounding up). That Follower gets STA +3 and gains the following skill: "▶Turn Start: This card's SIZE is changed to its original value."
skill_text.200716: All Followers on the enemy Field get DEF decreased by your Shuffles. If there is a card in your Grave with the name "Report", a random Spell on the enemy Field is sent to the Grave. The first Follower on the enemy Field with a total ATK+STA of at least 23 gets ATK/STA set equal to the total SIZE of the enemy Field.
skill_text.200717: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get ATK=2, DEF=2, STA=2, or SIZE=2 (randomly). The last Follower in your Deck is sent to the top of your Deck.
skill_text.200718: Both Decks are shuffled. Your Character gets LIFE +1. You get Shuffles=0~2. A random Follower in your Hand, a random Follower in your Deck, and a random Follower on your Field each get ATK +1~3/STA +1~3.
skill_text.200719: The first two cards in your Deck with "Asmis" in the name are sent to the first two empty Slots in your Hand. A random Follower on the enemy Field with a SIZE less than or equal to the number of cards in your Hand with "Asmis" in the name is sent to the Grave.
skill_text.200720: 2 random Followers on your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. If both of those Followers have "Asmis" in the name, a card with the name "Girl Detective Asmis" is created in the first empty Slot on your Field.
skill_text.200721: A random Academy Follower on your Field gains the skill "▶Attack: The defender gets STA -2.". If that Follower has "Linus" in the name, it gains the skill "▶Attack: The defender gets STA -3." instead.
skill_text.200722: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets its "Defend" skills changed to "▶Defend: The attacker gets STA +1.". The first two cards in your Deck with "Linus" in the name are sent to the first two empty Slots in your Hand.
skill_text.200723: A random Crux Follower on your Field gains the skill "▶Attack: This card gets ATK +1.". If that Follower has "Rose" in the name, it gains the skill "▶Attack: This card gets ATK +2." instead.
skill_text.200724: A random Follower on the enemy Field gets its "Attack" skills changed to "▶Attack: The defender gets ATK +1.". The first two cards in your Deck with "Rose" in the name are sent to the first two empty Slots in your Hand.
skill_text.200725: The first two cards in your Deck with "Helena" in the name are sent to the first two empty Slots in your Hand. A number of cards equal to the number of cards in your Hand with "Helena" in the name are sent from the top of your Grave to the bottom of your Deck. This card is removed from the game.
skill_text.200726: The first Follower on your Field with "Helena" in the name is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, the first Darklore Follower in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field and gets SIZE -2/ATK +2/STA +2.
skill_text.200728: A random deactivated Follower on your Field is reactivated. If this happens, a random active Follower on the enemy Field is deactivated.
skill_text.200729: All Followers on the enemy Field get DEF/STA decreased by twice their own DEF. If the enemy Character's LIFE is at least 15, this card is sent to the top of your Deck.
skill_text.200730: The first Follower in your Deck with the same SIZE as the first Follower on your Field is sent to the last empty Slot on your Field. If that Follower belongs to Academy, it gets ATK +2/STA +2.
skill_text.200731: You get Shuffles=3. All cards on your Field/Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. All Followers on the enemy Field get STA decreased by the number of sent Academy cards.
skill_text.200732: The card in your Deck with the highest SIZE is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If that card belongs to Crux, the card in your Deck with the lowest SIZE is sent to the top of your Deck.
skill_text.200733: You get Shuffles +1 and the enemy gets Shuffles -1. The following effects are applied depending on the Turn Number. Multiple of 2: All Followers on your Field get ATK +3. Multiple of 3: All Followers on the enemy Field get STA -5.
skill_text.200734: The first Follower on your Field with "Crescent" or "Scardel" in the name is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, the first Follower in your Grave with "Crescent" or "Scardel" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field and gets STA increased by half the STA of the Follower that was sent to the top of your Deck (rounding up).
skill_text.200735: If you have a Darklore Character, 2 Followers with the name "Zombie" are created on the enemy Field and get SIZE=1/ATK=0/DEF=1/STA=5. A random Follower on your Field gets ATK +5/STA +5 and gains the following skill: "▶Attack: If the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this card's ATK, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If the Turn Number is a multiple of 3, this skill is removed."
skill_text.200736: All Vita Followers on your Field get their original skills restored. Those Followers get SIZE decerased by the number of changed skills.
skill_text.200737: 2 Followers are created on your Field depending on the number of cards in your Field/Grave with "Occult" in the name. 0~4: Zombie (SIZE 1, 7/0/7), 5~8: Mist Lady (SIZE 2, 9/1/9), 9 or more: Devil (SIZE 3, 10/3/10).
skill_text.200738: The enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If there are at least 10 cards in your Grave with "Occult" in the name, the enemy Character gets an additional LIFE -3.
skill_text.200739: The first card on your Field with "Occult" in the name is sent to the Grave. If this happens, 2 random cards on the enemy Field are sent to the Grave.
skill_text.200740: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get STA decreased by half the number of cards in your Grave with "Occult" in the name (rounding up).
skill_text.200741: Your Character gets LIFE -2. All Crux Followers on your Field get ATK doubled and get their original skills restored. Those Followers gain the following skill: "▶Turn Start: This card is sent to the Grave."
skill_text.200742: All Followers on your Field/Deck with "Crescent" or "Scardel" in the name get STA +1. If those Followers have at least 10 STA, they get an additional ATK +1. If your Grave contains at least 8 cards, they get an additional STA +1.
skill_text.200743: If there are any Spells on the enemy Field, the first Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the last empty Slot on the enemy Field.
skill_text.200744: If there are any Followers in your Hand whose SIZE is 4, your Character gets LIFE +2. 2 random Followers in your Hand get SIZE cut in half (rounding down). A card with the name "4 Messages" is created at the top of your Deck.
skill_text.200745: If the number of Spells on the enemy Field is greater than or equal to the number of Followers on the enemy Field, a random Spell on the enemy Field is sent to the Grave. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by the sent card's SIZE.
skill_text.200746: Followers on your Field with "Maid" in the name get their ATK/DEF/STA changed to the highest ATK/DEF/STA of any Followers on your Field with "Lady" in the name, while Followers on your Field with "Lady" in the name get their ATK/DEF/STA changed to the highest ATK/DEF/STA of any Followers on your Field with "Maid" in the name (these effects occur simultaneously).
skill_text.200747: A random Spell on the enemy Field that is not called "The Flower's Secret" is copied to the last empty Slot on your Field.
skill_text.200748: All Followers on your Field get STA increased by the number of skills they each possess, then each Follower gains an additional copy of its first skill.
skill_text.200749: 2 random Followers on the enemy Field get SIZE +1. If those Followers' STA are greater than their original values, they get an additional STA -5.
skill_text.200750: If there are at least 2 cards on your Field that belong to the same faction as your Character, a random card on the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If the sent card is a Follower, it gets STA +3. If it is a Spell, it gets SIZE -1.
skill_text.200755: A number of cards with the name "Good Job" equal to the SIZE of a random Spell in the enemy Hand are created at the top of the enemy Deck.
skill_text.200756: All Followers on both Fields get SIZE changed to their original values.
skill_text.200757: A random Spell in the enemy Hand is copied to a random location in your Deck.
skill_text.200758: The Follower on your Field with the highest SIZE gets SIZE -1/ATK +2/DEF +2/STA +2. If that Follower's SIZE is 2 or less, this card is sent to the top of your Deck.
skill_text.200759: All Spells on the enemy Field with a SIZE less than the number of Followers on your Field with "Lady" in the name are sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
skill_text.200760: The Follower on your Field with the lowest STA and "Lady" in the name is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random Follower in your Hand with "Maid" in the name is sent to the previous Follower's old Slot on your Field.
skill_text.200761: All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by twice the number of cards on your Field.
skill_text.200762: All Followers on your Field whose SIZE and Slot Number are both odd or both even get DEF +2.
skill_text.200763: A Follower on your Field with 0 or less DEF gets DEF changed to half that Follower's SIZE (rounding up).
skill_text.200764: The Follower on your Field with the lowest STA is sent to the Grave. The first Followers in your Field and Hand get STA increased by the sent Follower's original STA.
skill_text.200765: A random Follower on your Field gets STA +2 and is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, a random Follower on the enemy Field gets STA -2 and is sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
skill_text.200766: If there are any Spells on the enemy Field, a random Follower in the enemy Grave is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field and gains the following skill: "▶Turn Start: This card is sent to the Grave."
skill_text.200767: The last Spell in the enemy Grave is copied to the top of your Deck. All Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by the copied card's SIZE.
skill_text.200768: 2 random Neutral cards in your Hand get SIZE -1. A random Neutral Follower on your Field gets ATK/STA increased by half the total SIZE of the previous 2 Neutral cards (rounding down).
skill_text.200769: All Followers on your Field get STA +3. This card gets SIZE=8~10, is sent to the last empty Slot on your Field, and remains active. If this card's SIZE is at least 8, both players get Shuffles set equal to this card's SIZE minus 8 instead.
skill_text.200770: All Followers on your Field are deactivated. All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by 1.5 times the number of deactivated Followers (rounding up). This card gets SIZE=1 and remains active. If this card's SIZE is 1, all Followers on your Field are reactivated instead.
skill_text.200771: The follower on your Field with the lowest STA gains the skill "▶Defend: This card is destroyed.". 3 random Followers in the enemy Deck gain the skill "▶Defend: This card is destroyed.".
skill_text.200772: All cards in both Fields and Hands get SIZE changed to their original values. All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the total change in SIZE (if you have an Academy Character) or half the total change in SIZE (rounding down, if you do not have an Academy Character).
skill_text.200773: If you have a Crux Character, all Followers on the enemy Field are deactivated and gain the skill "▶Defend: This card is moved to a random empty Slot on either Field. This skill is removed."
skill_text.200774: All cards in the enemy Grave that belong to a different faction than then enemy Character are removed from the game. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of removed cards (by a maximum of 3). If the number of removed cards was 5 or less, all Followers in your Hand and Field get ATK +2/STA +2. If the number of removed cards was 5 or more, a random Spell on the enemy Field is sent to the Grave.
